Ê†πÊçÆÂâßÊÉÖ‰ªãÁªçÔºå„Ää‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰πêÈòü„ÄãÈÄöËøáÂâß‰∏≠‰∫∫Áâ©ÂÖ∞Ëø™Âò≤ËÆΩÁæéÂõΩÁöÑÁîµÂΩ±ÂíåÁîµËßÜËäÇÁõÆ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰∏≠ÂõΩÂ∏ÇÂú∫ËÄåÂàªÊÑèËøéÂêà‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑÂÆ°Êü•Âà∂Â∫¶ÔºåÂπ∂Â∞ÜÂ∞èÁÜäÁª¥Â∞º„ÄÅÂä≥ÊîπËê•„ÄÅÁ¨¨ÂçÅÂõõ‰∏ñËææËµñÂñáÂòõ„ÄÅ‰∏≠ÂõΩÂô®ÂÆòÁßªÊ§ç„ÄÅÈªëË°£Á§∫Â®ÅËÄÖ‰∏éË≠¶ÂØüÂØπÂ≥ôÔºàÊöóÊåáÈ¶ôÊ∏ØÊ∞ë‰∏ªÊäó‰∫âÔºâ„ÄÅÊ∞¥ÁÇÆËΩ¶Á≠âÂÜÖÂÆπÂèçÂ∫îÂú®ÂâßÊÉÖ‰∏≠„ÄÇÂâß‰∏≠‰∫∫Áâ©ÂÖ∞Ëø™ÁöÑÂÑøÂ≠êÊñØÂù¶ÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÁªÑÂª∫‰πêÈòüÔºåÂ®±‰πêÂÖ¨Âè∏ËÄÅÊùøÂª∫ËÆÆ‰ªñÂà∞‰∏≠ÂõΩÂèëÂ±ïÔºå‰ΩÜË¶ÅÈù¢ÂØπ‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑË®ÄËÆ∫ÂÆ°Êü•„ÄÇÁªìÊûúÔºåÊñØÂù¶Ë¢´ÂëäÁü•ÔºåÊ≠åËØç‰∏≠‰∏çËÉΩÊèêÂèäËææËµñÂñáÂòõ„ÄÅÊ¥ªÊëòÂô®ÂÆòÁ≠âÂ≠óÊ†∑ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ëøô‰∏çÁ¨¶Âêà‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑË¶ÅÊ±Ç„ÄÇÂÖ∞Ëø™‰∏çÂæóÂ∑≤Ë∑ü‰∏≠ÂõΩÁßÅ‰∏ãËææÊàêÂçèËÆÆÔºåÊùÄÂÆ≥‰∫ÜÂ∞èÁÜäÁª¥Â∞º‰ª•Ëé∑Âæó‰∏≠ÂõΩÂ∏ÇÂú∫‰ªΩÈ¢ù„ÄÇËÄåÊñØÂù¶‰∏çÊÑøÊÑèËøùÂøÉËøõÂÖ•‰∏≠ÂõΩÂ∏ÇÂú∫ÔºåÊúÄÁªàÊîæÂºÉ‰∫Ü‰πêÈòüËÆ°Âàí„ÄÇ ÊúÄÂ§ßÂø´‰∫∫ÂøÉÁöÑÊòØËøô‰∏™ÈÅìÊ≠â‰ø°Ôºö Â∏åÊúõÂÖ®‰∏ñÁïåÁöÑ‰ºÅ‰∏öÂíåÂõ¢‰ΩìÈÉΩËÉΩÂÉè NBA ‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåÊ¨¢Ëøé‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑÂÆ°Êü•Âà∂Â∫¶ËøõÂÖ•Âà∞‰ªñ‰ª¨ÁöÑÂÆ∂ÈáåÂíåÂøÉÈáåÔºåÂØπÈáëÈí±ÁöÑÁÉ≠Áà±ÈÉΩËÉΩËÉúËøáÊ∞ë‰∏ªÂíåËá™Áî±„ÄÇCome onÔºåChinaÔºÅ ÂíåÂêåÂ≠¶Â∞èËÅö‰∏äÂë®Á∫¶‰∫ÜÂú®Êó•Â∑•‰ΩúÁöÑÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂêåÂ≠¶‰∏ÄËµ∑ÂêÉÈ•≠Ôºå‰∏§‰∏™ÊúàÂâçÂàöÂà∞Êó•Êú¨Êó∂‰ªñËØ∑ÊàëÂêÉ‰∫Ü‰∏™È•≠ËøòÂéªÁßãÂè∂ÂéüÂíåÂçÉÂè∂ÂéøÈÄõ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂúà„ÄÇÊÉ≥ÁùÄÊ≤°Âá†Â§©Â∞±Ë¶ÅÂõûÂõΩ‰∫ÜÔºåË∂ÅÁùÄËøòÊúâÂë®Êú´ÂõûËØ∑‰∏Ä‰∏ã„ÄÇÂú®ÂÖ¨ÂØìÁúã‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞èÊó∂ÁöÑÁîµËßÜÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®ÈôÑËøëÂêÉ‰∫ÜÁÉ§ËÇâÔºåÂë≥ÈÅìËøòÊå∫‰∏çÈîô„ÄÇÂú®ËøôËæπÁâ©‰ª∑È´òÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂè£Âë≥Â∑ÆË∑ùÊúâÁÇπÂ§ßÔºåÂü∫Êú¨Ê≤°ËøüÂà∞ÊØîËæÉÂà∫ÊøÄÁöÑÈ£üÁâ©ÔºåÂõûÂõΩ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÂ§öÂêÉÂá†È°øÁÅ´ÈîÖÔºÅ Áé∞Âú®ÊâçÂèëÁé∞ÂêÉÈ•≠ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÂøòËÆ∞ÊãçÁÖß‰∫Ü„ÄÇ„ÄÇ ÂêÉÂÆå‰∫ÜÈ•≠‰∏ÄËµ∑Âéª‰∫ÜÊ≠åËàû‰ºéÁî∫Ôºå‰º†ËØ¥‰∏≠È£é‰øóÂ∫óËÅöÈõÜÁöÑÂú∞Êñπ„ÄÇ‰πãÂâçÂè™ÊòØÂê¨Âêå‰∫ã‰ª¨ËØ¥Ôºå‰ªäÂ§©Âéª‰∫ÜÊâçÂèëÁé∞Ë∂ÖÂá∫‰∫ÜÊàëÁöÑÊÉ≥Ë±°„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫ÊòØÂë®Êú´ÁöÑÂéüÂõ†ÔºåÊ∏∏ÂÆ¢ÊØîËæÉÂ§ö„ÄÇ ËΩ¨‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂúàÊ≠åËàû‰ºéÁî∫Ôºå‰ªé‰∏Ä‰∏ÅÁõÆÂà∞‰∏â‰∏ÅÁõÆÔºåÊÑüËßâËµ∞ÂæóÊúâÁÇπÁ¥ØÔºåÂ∞±Âéª‰∫ÜËä±Âõ≠Á•ûÁ§æ‰ºëÊÅØÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÊôö‰∏äËä±Âõ≠Á•ûÁ§æÂ∑≤Áªè‰ºëÊÅØ‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ‰ºëÊÅØÂÆåÊØïÂõûÂà∞Êñ∞ÂÆøÁ´ôÔºåÊâæÂà∞ËΩ¶Á´ôÂÖ•Âè£ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÊâçÂèëÁé∞ÔºåÊÄªÊ≠¶Á∫øÂíåÂ§ßÊ±üÊà∑Á∫øÁ´ôÂè∞Âú®Áõ∏ÂèçÊñπÂêëÔºåËøòÊ≤°ÂèçÂ∫îËøáÊù•ËØ¥‰∫Ü‰∏§Âè•ËØùÂ∞±ÂàÜÊâã‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂêåÂ≠¶‰πüÂíåÊàë‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÊÉ≥Âú®‰ªäÂπ¥Âπ¥Â∫ïÁ¶ªËÅåÔºåÂõûÂçóÊñπÂ∑•‰ΩúÔºåÂ∏åÊúõÈÉΩËÉΩÈ°∫Âà©ÁöÑËΩ¨ËÅåÂêß„ÄÇ

entry.title: ÂÆâË£ÖÁîµÊ±†È©±Âä®
OpenCV‚Äî‚Äîcv2.inRange()ÂáΩÊï∞
entry.content: Âú®ÂõæÂÉè‰∏≠ÊèêÂèñÁõÆÊ†áÁâ©Êó∂ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®ËØ•ÂáΩÊï∞ÂéªÈô§ËÉåÊôØ„ÄÇ Êúâ‰∏â‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö hsv_imgÔºöÈ¢úËâ≤Á©∫Èó¥‰∏∫ HSV ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÔºõ lowerÔºö‰∏ãÈòàÂÄºÔºåÂõæÂÉè‰∏≠‰Ωé‰∫éÊ≠§ÂÄºÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤ÂÄºÂèò‰∏∫ 0Ôºõ uppperÔºö‰∏äÈòàÂÄºÔºåÂõæÂÉè‰∏≠È´ò‰∫éÊ≠§ÂÄºÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤ÂÄºÂèò‰∏∫ 0„ÄÇ È¢úËâ≤ÂÄºÂú®Ê≠§ËåÉÂõ¥ÂÜÖÁöÑÂÖ®ÈÉ®ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫255ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂà©Áî®ÂæóÂà∞ËÉåÊôØÂíåÂéüÂõæÁâáËøõË°å‰ΩçÊìç‰ΩúÔºåÂç≥ÂèØÂæóÂà∞ÂéüÂõæ‰∏≠ÁõÆÊ†á„ÄÇ Â∏∏Áî®ÊñπÂºèÔºö 12345678910img = cv2.imread(img_path, 0)img_hsv = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_RGB2HSV)lower = [0, 100, 100]uppper = [200, 255, 255]# Âà©Áî®‰∏ä‰∏ãÈòàÂÄºÂéªÈô§ËÉåÊôØÈÉ®ÂàÜmask = cv2.inRange(img_hsv, lower, upper)# Âà©Áî®‰ΩçËøêÁÆóÂæóÂà∞ÁõÆÊ†áÁâ©‰Ωìtarget = cv2.bitwise_and(img, img, mask=mask)cv2.imshow("mask", mask)cv2.imshow("target", target) ‰∏ä‰∏ãÈòàÂÄºÁöÑËé∑ÂèñÔºö 123456import cv2import numpy as npcolor = np.array([[[xxx, xxx, xxx]]])hsv_color = cv2.cvtColor(color, cv2.COLOR_RGB2HSV)print(hsv_color)

entry.title: OpenCV Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞Ôºà‰∏ÄÔºâ
entry.content: OpenCV ‚Äî Áª¥Âü∫ÁôæÁßë OpenCVÁöÑÂÖ®Áß∞ÊòØOpen Source Computer Vision LibraryÔºåÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë∑®Âπ≥Âè∞ÁöÑËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫ËßÜËßâÂ∫ì„ÄÇOpenCVÊòØÁî±Ëã±ÁâπÂ∞îÂÖ¨Âè∏ÂèëËµ∑Âπ∂ÂèÇ‰∏éÂºÄÂèëÔºå‰ª•BSDËÆ∏ÂèØËØÅÊéàÊùÉÂèëË°åÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âú®ÂïÜ‰∏öÂíåÁ†îÁ©∂È¢ÜÂüü‰∏≠ÂÖçË¥π‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇOpenCVÂèØÁî®‰∫éÂºÄÂèëÂÆûÊó∂ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÅËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫ËßÜËßâ‰ª•ÂèäÊ®°ÂºèËØÜÂà´Á®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇ ËØªÂèñÂíåÊòæÁ§∫ÂõæÂÉè cv2.imread()ÔºöËØªÂèñ cv2.imwrite()ÔºöÂÜôÂÖ• cv2.imshow()ÔºöÊòæÁ§∫ 1234567img = cv2.imread(img_path, 0)cv2.namedWindow("imview", cv2.WINDOW_NORMAL)cv2.imshow("imview", img)k = cv2.waitKey(0)if k == ord("s"): cv2.imwrite("other.jpg", img)cv2.destroyAllWindows() ËßÜÈ¢ëÁöÑÊìç‰Ωú‰ªéÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ËØªÂèñËßÜÈ¢ë cv2.VideoCapture(0).read() cv2.cvtColor() cv2.imshow() cap.get(propId) 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930def create_video(): cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0) while True: ret, frame = cap.read() gray = cv2.cvtColor(frame, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY) cv2.imshow("frame", gray) if cv2.waitKey() == ord("q"): break cap.release() cv2.destroyAllWindows() def video(): cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0) fourcc = cv2.VideoWriter_fourcc(*'XVID') out = cv2.VideoWriter("output.avi", fourcc, 20, 0, (640, 480)) while (cap.isOpened()): ret, frame = cap.read() if ret: frame = cv2.flip(frame, 0) out.write(frame) cv2.imshow("video", frame) if cv2.waitKey(0) == ord("q"): break else: break cap.release() out.release() cv2.destroyAllWindows() ‰ªéÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñËßÜÈ¢ëcv2.VideoCapture(0)Ë°®Á§∫ÊâìÂºÄÈªòËÆ§ËÆæÂ§áÔºåÂ∞ÜËÆæÂ§áÁ¥¢ÂºïÂè∑ÊîπÊàêËßÜÈ¢ëÊñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂêçÁß∞Â∞±ËÉΩ‰ªéËßÜÈ¢ëÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ËØªÂèñËßÜÈ¢ëÔºå‰ΩøÁî® waitKey()ÊéßÂà∂Êí≠ÊîæÈÄüÂ∫¶ÔºàÈÄöÂ∏∏25 msÔºâ„ÄÇ OpenCV ‰∏≠ÁöÑÁªòÂõæÂáΩÊï∞Â≠¶‰ºö‰ª•‰∏ãÂáΩÊï∞ÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®Ôºö cv2.line() cv2.circle() cv2.rectangle() cv2.ellipse() cv2.putText() ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö‰∏äÈù¢ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÁªòÂõæÂáΩÊï∞ÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö img ÔºöÁîªÂ∏É color : ÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÈ¢úËâ≤ÔºåRGB->(255, 255, 0) linetype : Á∫øÊù°ÁöÑÁ±ªÂûãÔºå8ËøûÊé•ÔºåÊäóÈîØÈΩøÁ≠â„ÄÇlineType=cv2.LINE_AAÔºàÊäóÈîØÈΩøÔºâ„ÄÇ ÁîªÁ∫øÁîª‰∏ÄÊù°Áõ¥Á∫øÈúÄË¶ÅÊåáÂÆöÁõ¥Á∫øÁöÑËµ∑ÁÇπÂíåÁªàÁÇπÔºö 123456def draw_line2(): canvas = np.zeros((300, 300, 3), dtype="uint8") green = (0, 255, 0) cv2.line(canvas, (20, 20), (150, 150), color=green) cv2.imshow("green line", canvas) cv2.waitKey(0) ÁîªÁü©ÂΩ¢ÁªòÂà∂Áü©ÂΩ¢ÈúÄË¶ÅÊåáÂÆö‰∏§‰∏™ÁÇπÁöÑÂùêÊ†áÔºö 123456def draw_rectangle(): canvas = np.zeros((300, 300, 3), dtype="uint8") color = (126, 126, 126) cv2.rectangle(canvas, (80, 80), (250, 270), color=color) cv2.imshow("rectangle", canvas) cv2.waitKey(0) ÁîªÂúÜÁªòÂà∂ÂúÜÂΩ¢ÈúÄË¶ÅÊåáÂÆöÂúÜÂøÉÂùêÊ†áÂíåÂçäÂæÑÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºö 123456def draw_circle(): canvas = np.zeros((300, 300, 3), dtype="uint8") color = (100, 100, 100) cv2.circle(canvas, (150, 140), 100, color=color) cv2.imshow("circle", canvas) cv2.waitKey(0) ÁîªÊ§≠ÂúÜÁªòÂà∂Ê§≠ÂúÜÈúÄË¶ÅÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö ‰∏≠ÂøÉÁÇπÂùêÊ†á ÈïøËΩ¥ÂíåÁü≠ËΩ¥ Ê≤øÈÄÜÊó∂ÈíàÊñπÂêëÊóãËΩ¨ÁöÑËßíÂ∫¶ È°∫Êó∂ÈíàÊñπÂêëËµ∑ÂßãËßíÂ∫¶ÂíåÁªìÊùüËßíÂ∫¶ 123456def draw_ellipse(): canvas = np.zeros((400, 400, 3), dtype="uint8") color = (100, 100, 100) cv2.ellipse(canvas, (200, 200), (100, 150), 0, 0, 360, color) cv2.imshow("ellipse", canvas) cv2.waitKey(0) Âú®ÂõæÁâá‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†ÊñáÂ≠óÊâÄÈúÄÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö Ê∑ªÂä†ÁöÑÊñáÊú¨ ÁªòÂà∂ÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ Â≠ó‰ΩìÁ±ªÂûã Â≠ó‰ΩìÂ§ßÂ∞è ÊñáÂ≠óÁöÑ‰∏ÄËà¨Â±ûÊÄßÔºàÈ¢úËâ≤ÔºåÁ≤óÁªÜÔºåÁ∫øÊù°Á±ªÂûãÁ≠âÔºâ 1234567def put_text(): canvas = np.zeros((300, 600, 3), dtype="uint8") font = cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX cv2.putText(canvas, 'Kanna Makino', (10, 100), font, 2, (100, 100, 100), 2) cv2.imshow("put text", canvas) cv2.waitKey(0) cv2.destroyAllWindows() ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ Â≠¶‰π†‰ΩøÁî® OpenCV Â§ÑÁêÜÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºöcv2.setMouseCallback() ÁÆÄÂçïÁ§∫‰æãÈº†Ê†á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂèØ‰ª•Ëé∑Âæó‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂùêÊ†áÂíå‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂêçÁß∞„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314def draw_circle(event, x, y, flags, params): if event == cv2.EVENT_LBUTTONDBLCLK: cv2.circle(img, (x, y), 100, (255, 255, 255), -1, lineType=cv2.LINE_AA)img = np.zeros((512, 512, 3), dtype="uint8")cv2.namedWindow('image')cv2.setMouseCallback('image', draw_circle)while 1: cv2.imshow('image', img) if cv2.waitKey(20) & 0xFF == 27: breakcv2.destroyAllWindows() Áî®ÊªëÂä®Êù°ÂÅöË∞ÉËâ≤ÊùøÂ≠¶‰π†ÁõÆÊ†áÔºö Â≠¶‰ºöÊääÊªëÂä®Êù°ÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ OpenCV ÁöÑÁ™óÂè£ cv2.getTrackbarPos() cv2.createTrackbar() ‰ª£Á†ÅÁ§∫‰æã1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435#!/usr/bin/env python# _*_cdoing:utf-8_*_import numpy as npimport cv2def nothing(x): passimg = np.zeros((500, 312, 3), dtype="uint8")cv2.namedWindow("image")cv2.createTrackbar("R", "image", 0, 255, nothing)cv2.createTrackbar("G", "image", 0, 255, nothing)cv2.createTrackbar("B", "image", 0, 255, nothing)switch = '0:OFF\n1:ON'cv2.createTrackbar(switch, "image", 0, 1, nothing)while 1: cv2.imshow("image", img) k = cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF if k == 27: break r = cv2.getTrackbarPos("R", "image") g = cv2.getTrackbarPos("G", "image") b = cv2.getTrackbarPos("B", "image") s = cv2.getTrackbarPos(switch, "image") if s == 0: img[:] = 0 else: img[:] = [r, g, b]cv2.destroyAllWindows() ‰π†È¢ò ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁîªÊùøÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄâÊã©ÂêÑÁßçÈ¢úËâ≤ÁöÑÁîªÁ¨îËøõË°åÁªòÁîªÊìç‰Ωú„ÄÇ ‰ª£Á†ÅÔºö 12def draw_circle(event, x, y, flag, params): pass Ê†∏ÂøÉÊìç‰ΩúÂõæÂÉèÁöÑÂü∫Á°ÄÊìç‰ΩúÂ≠¶‰π†ÁõÆÊ†áÔºö Ëé∑ÂèñÂÉèÁ¥†ÁöÑÂÄºÂπ∂‰øÆÊîπ Ëé∑ÂèñÂõæÂÉèÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄßÔºà‰ø°ÊÅØÔºâ ÂõæÂÉèÁöÑ ROIÔºàÔºâ ÂõæÂÉèÈÄöÈÅìÁöÑÊãÜÂàÜ‰∏éÂêàÂπ∂ Ëé∑ÂèñÂõæÂÉèÁöÑÂÉèÁ¥†1234567891011121314151617img = cv2.imread("/Users/youyou2608/Pictures/pi.png")print(img.item(10, 10, 2))img.itemset((10, 10, 2), 100)print(img.item(10, 10, 2))# entry.content: ÈÖ∏ÈÖ∏‰π≥Êê≠Âª∫ËøáÁ®ãÂ∞èËÆ∞ ssÁé∞Âú®ÁÆóÊòØÂÆåÂÖ®Ë¢´ËØÜÂà´‰∫ÜÔºåÂéªÂπ¥11ÊúàÂú®Âêå‰∫ãÁöÑÊé®Ëçê‰∏ãÁî®‰∫Ü ‰∫ëÂΩ±vpn Ôºå‰∏Ä‰∏™Êúà3ÁæéÂÖÉÔºå15GÊµÅÈáèÔºåÂØπ‰∫éÂπ≥Êó∂‰∏ä‰∏äTwitterÔºåstackoverflowÊù•ËØ¥ÔºåÂÆåÂÖ®Ë∂≥Â§ü‰∫ÜÔºåÊØèÊúàÈÉΩËÉΩÂâ©‰∏ã‰∏ÄÂçäÂ§öÊµÅÈáè„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÊÉ≥ÁùÄËá™Â∑±‰∏ÄËæπËä±Èí±Áî®ÁùÄÊÖ¢ÈÄüÁΩëÔºåËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂõΩÂ§ñvpsÂç¥Èó≤ÁùÄÊ≤°‰∫ãÂπ≤ÔºåËøòÊòØÂà©Áî®‰ª•‰∏ãÂêßÔºåËäÇÁ∫¶ËµÑÊ∫ê„ÄÇ ÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´ØÔºöÈ¶ñÂÖàÔºå‰∏ãËΩΩËÑöÊú¨Âà∞ /usr/local/ssr Ôºö 1sudo git clone https://github.com/ssrbackup/shadowsocksr /usr/local/ssr ÁÑ∂ÂêéÊâßË°åÂëΩ‰ª§Ôºö 1cd /usr/local/ssr && ./initcfg.sh ‰ºöÁúãÂà∞ÁîüÊàê‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ user-config.json Ôºå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Â∞ÜÂÆÉÂ§çÂà∂Âà∞ /etc/ssr-config.json ‰øÆÊîπÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ sudo vi /etc/ssr-config.json Â§ßËá¥ÂâçÈù¢Âá†È°πÈúÄË¶ÅÈÖçÁΩÆ‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºö 123456789101112"server": "******", // ‰ª£ÁêÜÊúçÂä°Âú∞ÂùÄ"server_ipv6": "::","server_port": 11873, // Á´ØÂè£Âè∑"local_address": "127.0.0.1", //Êú¨Âú∞socks5ÁõëÂê¨Âú∞ÂùÄ "local_port": 1080,//Êú¨Âú∞socks5‰ª£ÁêÜÁ´ØÂè£"password": "xxxxxx", //ÂØÜÁ†Å"method": "rc4-md5",//Âä†ÂØÜÊñπÂºè"protocol": "xxxxx",//ÂçèËÆÆ"protocol_param": "xxxxxx",//ÂçèËÆÆÂèÇÊï∞"obfs": "xxxxxx",//Ê∑∑Ê∑ÜÊñπÂºè"obfs_param": "xxxxxxxx",//Ê∑∑Ê∑ÜÂèÇÊï∞ ÊâßË°åÂëΩ‰ª§ÂêØÂä®ÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´ØÔºö sudo python shadowsocks/local.py -c /etc/ssr-config.json ÂêØÂä®ÊàêÂäüÂêéÔºåÊåâ ctrl + z ÂàáÊç¢Âá∫Êù•ÔºåÂÜçÁî® jobs Êü•Áúã‰ªªÂä°ÁºñÂè∑Ôºå‰ΩøÁî® bg %ÁºñÂè∑ ÂêéÂè∞ËøêË°åÔºõ ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøá jobs ÁúãÂà∞ÂêéÂè∞‰ªªÂä°ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøá fg %ÁºñÂè∑ ÂàáÊç¢ËøõÂéª„ÄÇ ÊúçÂä°Á´ØÊâßË°å‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§Ëé∑ÂèñËÑöÊú¨Ôºö 1wget -N --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToyoDAdoubi/doubi/master/ssr.sh && chmod +x ssr.sh && sudo bash ssr.sh ‰æùÁÖßÊèêÁ§∫ÂÆåÊàêÊúçÂä°Á´ØÂêÑ‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÂç≥ÂèØÁõëÂê¨ÊúçÂä°„ÄÇ Enjoy it ! ‰πãÂâçÊê≠Âª∫ÁöÑssÊâçÁî®‰∫Ü‰∏çÂà∞‰∏âÂ§©ÔºåËøûÊúçÂä°Âô®ipÈÉΩË¢´ÂíåË∞ê‰∫ÜÔºåssrÁî®‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏§‰∏™ÊòüÊúüËøòÂÅ•Âú®ÔºåÂ∫îËØ•ËÉΩÊîØÊíë‰∏ÄÊÆµÊó∂Èó¥Âêß„ÄÇ

entry.content: ‰∫ÜËß£JavaÊ≥®Ëß£Ôºà@AnnotationÔºâ ÂâçË®Ä ‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÁ™ÅÁÑ∂ÊÉ≥Ëµ∑Êù•Ê≥®Ëß£Âë¢Ôºü‰ªäÂ§©‰∏äÂçàÂêå‰∫ãÈÅáÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂíåÊ≥®Ëß£Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåJSPÈ°µÈù¢‰º†ÂÄºÂà∞ÂêéÂè∞ÂêéÔºàÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂâçÂêéÁ´ØÂπ∂‰∏çÂàÜÁ¶ªÔºâÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂú®POJOÁ±ª‰∏äÁöÑÊ†°È™åÊ≥®Ëß£ÂÄº‰∏çÊª°Ë∂≥ÁöÑÊù°‰ª∂‰∏ã‰πüÈÄöËøá‰∫ÜÔºåËÆ©ÊàëÁªôÂ∏ÆÂøôÁúãÁúã„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫ÂÖ∂‰ªñÁªÑÁöÑÂêå‰∫ãÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÈÄöÁî®‰ª£Á†ÅÂπ∂Ê≤°ÊúâËøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËÄå‰∏îÂØπÊ≥®Ëß£ÁöÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÊòØÂ∞ÅË£ÖÂú®Ê°ÜÊû∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•‰∏ÄÂºÄÂßã‰æøÊéíÈô§‰∫ÜÈóÆÈ¢òÂú®ÂêéÂè∞ÊÄùË∑ØÔºåËΩ¨ÂêëÈ°µÈù¢‰º†ÂÄºÂéªË∞ÉÊü•„ÄÇËôΩÁÑ∂ÊúÄÂêéÊâæÂà∞ÂéüÂõ†ÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫Ê≤°ÊúâÊ∏ÖÁ©∫EclipseÁöÑ.classÊñá‰ª∂ÈáçÊñ∞ÁºñËØëÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÊÑüËßâÂ∑≤ÁªèÂØπ‰πãÂâçÂ≠¶ËøáÁöÑÊ≥®Ëß£ÈÉ®ÂàÜÁöÑÁü•ËØÜÁîüÁñè‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂàöÂ•Ω‰ªäÂ§©Ê≤°Âä†Áè≠ÔºåÂ∞±Ëµ∂Á¥ßÂ§ç‰π†‰∏Ä‰∏ã„ÄÇ Êú¨ÊÉ≥Âú®ÁΩë‰∏äÊâæ‰∏§ÁØáÊñáÁ´†ÂõûÂøÜ‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂ•ΩÂÉè‰æãÂ≠êÂÜôÂæóÈÉΩ‰∏çÂÆåÊï¥„ÄÇÂàöÂ•ΩÂâçÊÆµÊó∂Èó¥Âàö‰π∞‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÊú¨„ÄäJavaÁºñÁ®ãÊÄùÊÉ≥„ÄãÔºåÂ∞±Ëµ∂Á¥ßÁøªÂºÄÁúã‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºå‰∏ÄÁõ¥ËÆ∞Âæó‰π¶ÈáåÁªôÂá∫ÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠ê‰πüÊòØÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÂ≠óÊÆµÊ≥®Ëß£Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑ„ÄÇ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥Ê¶ÇÂøµÂèäÂéüÁêÜÂèÇËßÅ ==> „ÄäJavaÁºñÁ®ãÊÄùÊÉ≥„ÄãÁ¨¨‰∫åÂçÅÁ´†<Ê≥®Ëß£>„ÄÇ Âõõ‰∏™ÂÖÉÊ≥®Ëß£Ôºö @Target @Retention @Document Inherited Ê≥®Ëß£‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØÁî®Êà∑ÊåâËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÈúÄÊ±ÇÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇ ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠êÂÖàÂàõÂª∫‰∏§‰∏™Ê≥®Ëß£Ôºå@DigitsÂíå@NotEmptyÔºåÁî®Êù•Ê≥®Ëß£Â±ûÊÄßÊòØÂê¶Êª°Ë∂≥ÁªôÂÆöÊù°‰ª∂„ÄÇ ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 1234567891011121314151617181920212223package com.Annotation;import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;import java.lang.annotation.Retention;import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;import java.lang.annotation.Target;/** * <p> * Ê†áÊ≥®‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÊÆµÂè™ËÉΩ‰∏∫Êï∞Â≠óÔºå‰∏îÊúÄÂ§ßÈïøÂ∫¶‰∏∫maxLengthÔºåÊúÄÂ§ßÂ∞èÊï∞‰Ωç‰∏∫fraction * ÈªòËÆ§Ê≤°ÊúâÂ∞èÊï∞‰Ωç * </p> * * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2019-05-14 21:42 */@Target(ElementType.FIELD)@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)public @interface Digits { public int maxLength(); public int fraction() default 0;} 12345678910111213141516171819package com.Annotation;import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;import java.lang.annotation.Retention;import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;import java.lang.annotation.Target;/** * <p> * Ê†áÊ≥®‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠óÊÆµ‰∏çËÉΩ‰∏∫Á©∫ * </p> * * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2019-05-14 21:47 */@Target(ElementType.FIELD)@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)public @interface NotEmpty {} ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ÑÁêÜÁ±ªÂ§ÑÁêÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ≥®Ëß£ÔºöÔºà‰∏ªË¶ÅÂà©Áî®ÂèçÂ∞ÑÊú∫Âà∂Ôºâ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354package com.Annotation;import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;import java.lang.reflect.Field;/** * <p> * Â§ÑÁêÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ≥®Ëß£ * </p> * * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2019-05-14 21:59 */public class AnnotationProcesser { public void process(Table table) throws ClassNotFoundException, IllegalAccessException, NoSuchFieldException { Class clazz = table.getClass(); if (clazz == null) { throw new ClassNotFoundException("class not found!"); } Field[] fields = clazz.getDeclaredFields(); String fieldName; for (Field field : fields) { System.out.println("--------------------------"); field.setAccessible(true); Annotation[] annotations = field.getDeclaredAnnotations(); fieldName = field.getName(); System.out.println("--> info: into " + fieldName); for (Annotation annotation : annotations) { System.out.println("--> info: " + annotation.annotationType()); if (annotation instanceof Digits) { System.out.println("--> info: get @Digits annotation on " + fieldName); int maxLength = ((Digits) annotation).maxLength(); int annotatedFraction = ((Digits) annotation).fraction(); String[] fraction = String.valueOf(table.getCount()).split("\\."); if (String.valueOf(table.getCount()).length() > maxLength) { System.out.println("--> error: maxLength exceed!"); } if (fraction.length > 1 && fraction[1].length() > annotatedFraction) { System.out.println("--> errorÔºöfraction length exceed!"); } else { System.out.println("--> info: " + fieldName + " validate success!"); } } else if (annotation instanceof NotEmpty) { System.out.println("--> info: get @NotEmpty annotation on " + fieldName); if (table.getDescription() == null || "".equals(table.getDescription())) { System.out.println("--> error: empty is not allowed!"); } else { System.out.println("--> info: " + fieldName + " validate success!"); } } } } }} ‰∏ªÊµãËØïÁ±ªÔºöÔºàÁúÅÁï•getterÂíåsetterÔºâ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637package com.Annotation;/** * <p> * Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ≥®Ëß£ÊµãËØïÁ±ª * </p> * * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2019-05-14 21:49 */public class Table { @Digits(maxLength = 6, fraction = 2) private double count; @NotEmpty private String description; public Table(double count, String description) { this.count = count; this.description = description; } public static void main(String[] args) throws IllegalAccessException, ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchFieldException { Table testTable1 = new Table(1234567, "description1"); Table testTable2 = new Table(12.001, "description2"); Table testTable3 = new Table(123.01, "description3"); Table testTable4 = new Table(123.01, null); Table testTable5 = new Table(123.01, "description5"); AnnotationProcesser processer = new AnnotationProcesser(); processer.process(testTable1); processer.process(testTable2); processer.process(testTable3); processer.process(testTable4); processer.process(testTable5); }}

ÈöèÁùÄÊó∂Èó¥Êé®ÁßªÔºå‰∏çÊñ≠‰øÆÊîπÊé•Âè£ÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÈÉΩÂøÖÈ°ªÂêåÊ≠•‰øÆÊîπÊé•Âè£ÊñáÊ°£ÔºåËÄåÊñáÊ°£‰∏é‰ª£Á†ÅÂèàÂ§Ñ‰∫é‰∏§‰∏™‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÂ™í‰ªãÔºåÈô§ÈùûÊúâ‰∏•Ê†ºÁöÑÁÆ°ÁêÜÊú∫Âà∂Ôºå‰∏çÁÑ∂ÂæàÂÆπÊòìÂØºËá¥‰∏ç‰∏ÄËá¥Áé∞Ë±°„ÄÇ APIÊñáÊ°£„ÄÇÂÆÉÊó¢ÂèØ‰ª•ÂáèÂ∞ëÊàë‰ª¨ÂàõÂª∫ÊñáÊ°£ÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÈáèÔºåÂêåÊó∂ËØ¥ÊòéÂÜÖÂÆπÂèàÊï¥ÂêàÂÖ•ÂÆûÁé∞‰ª£Á†Å‰∏≠ÔºåËÆ©Áª¥Êä§ÊñáÊ°£Âíå‰øÆÊîπ‰ª£Á†ÅÊï¥Âêà‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰ΩìÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨Âú®‰øÆÊîπ‰ª£Á†ÅÈÄªËæëÁöÑÂêåÊó∂Êñπ‰æøÁöÑ‰øÆÊîπÊñáÊ°£ËØ¥Êòé„ÄÇÂè¶Â§ñSwagger2‰πüÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÂº∫Â§ßÁöÑÈ°µÈù¢ÊµãËØïÂäüËÉΩÊù•Ë∞ÉËØïÊØè‰∏™RESTful API„ÄÇÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö ‰∏ãÈù¢Êù•ÂÖ∑‰Ωì‰ªãÁªçÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂú®Spring Boot‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®Swagger2„ÄÇÈ¶ñÂÖàÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÈúÄË¶Å‰∏Ä‰∏™Spring BootÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑRESTful APIÂ∑•Á®ãÔºåËã•ÊÇ®Ê≤°ÊúâÂÅöËøáËøôÁ±ªÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÂª∫ËÆÆÂÖàÈòÖËØªSpring BootÊûÑÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ËæÉ‰∏∫Â§çÊùÇÁöÑRESTful APIsÂíåÂçïÂÖÉÊµãËØï„ÄÇ ‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÊàë‰ª¨‰ºö‰ª•ÊïôÁ®ãÊ†∑‰æã‰∏≠ÁöÑChapter3-1-1ËøõË°å‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑÂÆûÈ™åÔºàChpater3-1-5ÊòØÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÁªìÊûúÂ∑•Á®ãÔºå‰∫¶ÂèØÂèÇËÄÉÔºâ„ÄÇ Ê∑ªÂä†Swagger2‰æùËµñÂú®pom.xml‰∏≠Âä†ÂÖ•Swagger2ÁöÑ‰æùËµñ 12345678910<dependency> <groupId>io.springfox</groupId> <artifactId>springfox-swagger2</artifactId> <version>2.2.2</version></dependency><dependency> <groupId>io.springfox</groupId> <artifactId>springfox-swagger-ui</artifactId> <version>2.2.2</version></dependency> ÂàõÂª∫Swagger2ÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªÂú®Application.javaÂêåÁ∫ßÂàõÂª∫Swagger2ÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªSwagger2„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425@Configuration@EnableSwagger2public class Swagger2 { @Bean public Docket createRestApi() { return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2) .apiInfo(apiInfo()) .select() .apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.didispace.web")) .paths(PathSelectors.any()) .build(); } private ApiInfo apiInfo() { return new ApiInfoBuilder() .title("Spring Boot‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®Swagger2ÊûÑÂª∫RESTful APIs") .description("Êõ¥Â§öSpring BootÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÊñáÁ´†ËØ∑ÂÖ≥Ê≥®Ôºöhttp://blog.didispace.com/") .termsOfServiceUrl("http://blog.didispace.com/") .contact("Á®ãÂ∫èÁåøDD") .version("1.0") .build(); }} Â¶Ç‰∏ä‰ª£Á†ÅÊâÄÁ§∫ÔºåÈÄöËøá@ConfigurationÊ≥®Ëß£ÔºåËÆ©SpringÊù•Âä†ËΩΩËØ•Á±ªÈÖçÁΩÆ„ÄÇÂÜçÈÄöËøá@EnableSwagger2Ê≥®Ëß£Êù•ÂêØÁî®Swagger2„ÄÇ ÂÜçÈÄöËøácreateRestApiÂáΩÊï∞ÂàõÂª∫DocketÁöÑBean‰πãÂêéÔºåapiInfo()Áî®Êù•ÂàõÂª∫ËØ•ApiÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨‰ø°ÊÅØÔºàËøô‰∫õÂü∫Êú¨‰ø°ÊÅØ‰ºöÂ±ïÁé∞Âú®ÊñáÊ°£È°µÈù¢‰∏≠Ôºâ„ÄÇselect()ÂáΩÊï∞ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ApiSelectorBuilderÂÆû‰æãÁî®Êù•ÊéßÂà∂Âì™‰∫õÊé•Âè£Êö¥Èú≤ÁªôSwaggerÊù•Â±ïÁé∞ÔºåÊú¨‰æãÈááÁî®ÊåáÂÆöÊâ´ÊèèÁöÑÂåÖË∑ØÂæÑÊù•ÂÆö‰πâÔºåSwagger‰ºöÊâ´ÊèèËØ•ÂåÖ‰∏ãÊâÄÊúâControllerÂÆö‰πâÁöÑAPIÔºåÂπ∂‰∫ßÁîüÊñáÊ°£ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºàÈô§‰∫ÜË¢´@ApiIgnoreÊåáÂÆöÁöÑËØ∑Ê±ÇÔºâ„ÄÇ Ê∑ªÂä†ÊñáÊ°£ÂÜÖÂÆπÂú®ÂÆåÊàê‰∫Ü‰∏äËø∞ÈÖçÁΩÆÂêéÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂ∑≤ÁªèÂèØ‰ª•Áîü‰∫ßÊñáÊ°£ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØËøôÊ†∑ÁöÑÊñáÊ°£‰∏ªË¶ÅÈíàÂØπËØ∑Ê±ÇÊú¨Ë∫´ÔºåËÄåÊèèËø∞‰∏ªË¶ÅÊù•Ê∫ê‰∫éÂáΩÊï∞Á≠âÂëΩÂêç‰∫ßÁîüÔºåÂØπÁî®Êà∑Âπ∂‰∏çÂèãÂ•ΩÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÈÄöÂ∏∏ÈúÄË¶ÅËá™Â∑±Â¢ûÂä†‰∏Ä‰∫õËØ¥ÊòéÊù•‰∏∞ÂØåÊñáÊ°£ÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÈÄöËøá@ApiOperationÊ≥®Ëß£Êù•ÁªôAPIÂ¢ûÂä†ËØ¥Êòé„ÄÅÈÄöËøá@ApiImplicitParams„ÄÅ@ApiImplicitParamÊ≥®Ëß£Êù•ÁªôÂèÇÊï∞Â¢ûÂä†ËØ¥Êòé„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051@RestController@RequestMapping(value="/users") // ÈÄöËøáËøôÈáåÈÖçÁΩÆ‰Ωø‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑÊò†Â∞ÑÈÉΩÂú®/users‰∏ãÔºåÂèØÂéªÈô§public class UserController { static Map<Long, User> users = Collections.synchronizedMap(new HashMap<Long, User>()); @ApiOperation(value="Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑ÂàóË°®", notes="") @RequestMapping(value={""}, method=RequestMethod.GET) public List<User> getUserList() { List<User> r = new ArrayList<User>(users.values()); return r; } @ApiOperation(value="ÂàõÂª∫Áî®Êà∑", notes="Ê†πÊçÆUserÂØπË±°ÂàõÂª∫Áî®Êà∑") @ApiImplicitParam(name = "user", value = "Áî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜÂÆû‰Ωìuser", required = true, dataType = "User") @RequestMapping(value="", method=RequestMethod.POST) public String postUser(@RequestBody User user) { users.put(user.getId(), user); return "success"; } @ApiOperation(value="Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ", notes="Ê†πÊçÆurlÁöÑidÊù•Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ") @ApiImplicitParam(name = "id", value = "Áî®Êà∑ID", required = true, dataType = "Long") @RequestMapping(value="/{id}", method=RequestMethod.GET) public User getUser(@PathVariable Long id) { return users.get(id); } @ApiOperation(value="Êõ¥Êñ∞Áî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ", notes="Ê†πÊçÆurlÁöÑidÊù•ÊåáÂÆöÊõ¥Êñ∞ÂØπË±°ÔºåÂπ∂Ê†πÊçÆ‰º†ËøáÊù•ÁöÑuser‰ø°ÊÅØÊù•Êõ¥Êñ∞Áî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ") @ApiImplicitParams({ @ApiImplicitParam(name = "id", value = "Áî®Êà∑ID", required = true, dataType = "Long"), @ApiImplicitParam(name = "user", value = "Áî®Êà∑ËØ¶ÁªÜÂÆû‰Ωìuser", required = true, dataType = "User") }) @RequestMapping(value="/{id}", method=RequestMethod.PUT) public String putUser(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody User user) { User u = users.get(id); u.setName(user.getName()); u.setAge(user.getAge()); users.put(id, u); return "success"; } @ApiOperation(value="Âà†Èô§Áî®Êà∑", notes="Ê†πÊçÆurlÁöÑidÊù•ÊåáÂÆöÂà†Èô§ÂØπË±°") @ApiImplicitParam(name = "id", value = "Áî®Êà∑ID", required = true, dataType = "Long") @RequestMapping(value="/{id}", method=RequestMethod.DELETE) public String deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) { users.remove(id); return "success"; }} ÂÆåÊàê‰∏äËø∞‰ª£Á†ÅÊ∑ªÂä†‰∏äÔºåÂêØÂä®Spring BootÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºåËÆøÈóÆÔºöhttp://localhost:8080/swagger-ui.html„ÄÇÂ∞±ËÉΩÁúãÂà∞ÂâçÊñáÊâÄÂ±ïÁ§∫ÁöÑRESTful APIÁöÑÈ°µÈù¢„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÜçÁÇπÂºÄÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑAPIËØ∑Ê±ÇÔºå‰ª•POSTÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑ/usersËØ∑Ê±Ç‰∏∫‰æãÔºåÂèØÊâæÂà∞‰∏äËø∞‰ª£Á†Å‰∏≠Êàë‰ª¨ÈÖçÁΩÆÁöÑNotes‰ø°ÊÅØ‰ª•ÂèäÂèÇÊï∞userÁöÑÊèèËø∞‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫„ÄÇ [ APIÊñáÊ°£ËÆøÈóÆ‰∏éË∞ÉËØïÂú®‰∏äÂõæËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑÈ°µÈù¢‰∏≠ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÁúãÂà∞userÁöÑValueÊòØ‰∏™ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÔºüÊòØÁöÑÔºåSwaggerÈô§‰∫ÜÊü•ÁúãÊé•Âè£ÂäüËÉΩÂ§ñÔºåËøòÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜË∞ÉËØïÊµãËØïÂäüËÉΩÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•ÁÇπÂáª‰∏äÂõæ‰∏≠Âè≥‰æßÁöÑModel SchemaÔºàÈªÑËâ≤Âå∫ÂüüÔºöÂÆÉÊåáÊòé‰∫ÜUserÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªìÊûÑÔºâÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂Value‰∏≠Â∞±Êúâ‰∫ÜuserÂØπË±°ÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Âè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÁ®çÈÄÇ‰øÆÊîπÔºåÁÇπÂáª‰∏ãÊñπ‚ÄúTry it outÔºÅ‚ÄùÊåâÈíÆÔºåÂç≥ÂèØÂÆåÊàê‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÊ¨°ËØ∑Ê±ÇË∞ÉÁî®ÔºÅ Ê≠§Êó∂Ôºå‰Ω†‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÂá†‰∏™GETËØ∑Ê±ÇÊù•È™åËØÅ‰πãÂâçÁöÑPOSTËØ∑Ê±ÇÊòØÂê¶Ê≠£Á°Æ„ÄÇ entry.content: Á¨¨ÂçÅÂõõÁ´† Á±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØÊ†áÁ≠æÔºàÁ©∫Ê†ºÂàÜÈöîÔºâÔºö JavaÁºñÁ®ãÊÄùÊÉ≥ ËøêË°åÊó∂Á±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÂæó‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Âú®Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊó∂ÂèëÁé∞Âíå‰ΩøÁî®Á±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ Êú¨Á´†‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆ®ËÆ∫JavaÂ¶Ç‰ΩïËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨Âú®ËøêË°åÊó∂ËØÜÂà´ÂØπË±°ÂíåÁ±ªÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºå‰∏ªË¶ÅÊúâ‰∏§ÁßçÊñπÂºèÔºö ‚Äú‰º†ÁªüÁöÑRTTI‚ÄùÔºåÂÅáÂÆöÊàë‰ª¨Âú®ÁºñËØëÊó∂Â∑≤ÁªèÁü•ÈÅì‰∫ÜÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÁ±ªÂûãÔºõ ‚ÄúÂèçÂ∞ÑÊú∫Âà∂‚ÄùÔºåÂÖÅËÆ∏Âú®ËøêË°åÊó∂ÂèëÁé∞Âíå‰ΩøÁî®Á±ªÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ 14.1 ‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÈúÄË¶ÅRTTI(Run-Time Type Identification)RTTIÊèê‰æõÁ±ªÂûãÁª¥Êä§ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºå‰∏∫Â§öÊÄÅÊú∫Âà∂Êèê‰æõÂÆûÁé∞Âü∫Á°Ä„ÄÇÂ§öÊÄÅÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØÈÄöËøáÂêë‰∏äËΩ¨ÂûãÔºåÈÄöËøáÊ≥õÂåñÁà∂Á±ªÊù•ÂºïÁî®Â≠êÁ±ªÂØπË±°„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647package com.typeinfo;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.List;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-06 14:52 */public class Shapes { public static void main(String[] args) { List<Shape> shapeList = Arrays.asList(new Circle(), new Square(), new Triangle()); shapeList.forEach(Shape::draw); }}abstract class Shape { void draw() { System.out.println(this + ".draw."); } public abstract String toString();}class Circle extends Shape { @Override public String toString() { return "Circle"; }}class Triangle extends Shape { @Override public String toString() { return "Triangle"; }}class Square extends Shape { @Override public String toString() { return "Square"; }} output: 12345Circle.draw.Square.draw.Triangle.draw.Process finished with exit code 0 14.2 ClassÂØπË±°RTTIÁöÑÂäüËÉΩ‰∏ªË¶ÅÊòØÁî±ClassÁ±ªÂÆûÁé∞ÁöÑÔºåÊØè‰∏™Á±ªÈÉΩÊòØClassÁ±ªÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂØπË±°„ÄÇÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÁ±ªÈÉΩÊòØÂú®Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰ΩøÁî®Êó∂Ë¢´‚ÄùÁ±ªÂä†ËΩΩÂô®‚ÄùÂä®ÊÄÅÁöÑÂä†ËΩΩÂà∞JVM‰∏≠ÁöÑÔºåÂΩìÁ®ãÂ∫èÂàõÂª∫Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Á±ªÁöÑÊàêÂëòÂºïÁî®Êó∂Ôºå‰æø‰ºöÂä†ËΩΩËøô‰∏™Á±ªÔºåËøôËØ¥ÊòéÊûÑÈÄ†Âô®ÊòØÁ±ªÁöÑÈùôÊÄÅÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ‰ΩøÁî®newÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÁ±ªÁöÑÊñ∞ÂØπË±°‰πü‰ºöË¢´ÂΩì‰ΩúÁ±ªÁöÑÈùôÊÄÅÊàêÂëòÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§JavaÊòØÂä®ÊÄÅÂä†ËΩΩÁöÑ„ÄÇÈ¶ñÂÖàÊ£ÄÊü•Á±ªÁöÑClassÂØπË±°ÊòØÂê¶Âä†ËΩΩÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂ∞öÊú™Âä†ËΩΩÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑÁ±ªÁöÑÂä†ËΩΩÂô®‰ºöÊü•ÊâæÂêåÂêçÁöÑ.classÊñá‰ª∂,‰∏ÄÊó¶Êüê‰∏™Á±ªÁöÑClassÂØπË±°Ë¢´ËΩΩÂÖ•ÂÜÖÂ≠òÔºå‰æø‰ºöÁî®Êù•ÂàõÂª∫Ëøô‰∏™Á±ªÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÂØπË±°„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-07 17:07 */public class SweetShop { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("inside main."); new Candy(); System.out.println("after create candy"); new Candy(); System.out.println("after create candy2"); try{ Class.forName("com.typeinfo.Gum"); }catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { System.out.println("Class Gum not found."); } System.out.println("after create after gum."); new Cookie(); System.out.println("after create cookie"); }}class Candy { static { System.out.println("Loading candy."); }}class Gum { static { System.out.println("Loading gum."); }}class Cookie { static { System.out.println("Loading cookie."); }} output: 12345678910inside main.Loading candy.after create candyafter create candy2Loading gum.after create after gum.Loading cookie.after create cookieProcess finished with exit code 0 ‰ªéËæìÂá∫‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ÔºåJava‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ±ªÈÉΩÊòØÂú®ÈúÄË¶ÅÊó∂ÊâçË¢´Âä†ËΩΩÁöÑ„ÄÇforName()ÊòØClassÁ±ªÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùôÊÄÅÊàêÂëòÔºåË∞ÉÁî®ËØ•ÊñπÊ≥ïÂèØ‰ª•ËøîÂõûÁõ∏Â∫îÁ±ªÁöÑÂÆû‰æã„ÄÇÊó†ËÆ∫‰ΩïÊó∂ÔºåËã•Ë¶Å‰ΩøÁî®Á±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂøÖÈ°ªÊåÅÊúâClassÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂºïÁî®ÔºåClass.forName()ÊòØÂÆûÁé∞Ê≠§ÂäüËÉΩÁöÑ‰æøÊç∑ÊñπÂºèÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂÜç‰∏∫‰∫ÜËé∑ÂèñClassÂºïÁî®ËÄåÊåÅÊúâËØ•Á±ªÂûãÁöÑÂºïÁî®„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÂ∑≤ÁªèÊã•Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Á±ªÂûãÁöÑÂØπË±°ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®getClass()Êù•Ëé∑ÂèñClassÂºïÁî®ÔºåËøîÂõûË°®Á§∫ËØ•ÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÆûÈôÖÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑClassÂºïÁî®„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-07 18:22 */public class ToyTest { private static void printInfo(Class cc) { System.out.println("Class name: " + cc.getName() + " is interface? [" + cc.isInterface() + "]"); System.out.println("Simple name: " + cc.getSimpleName()); System.out.println("Canonical name: " + cc.getCanonicalName()); System.out.println("---------------"); } public static void main(String[] args) { Class c = null; try { c = Class.forName("com.typeinfo.FancyToy"); } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { System.out.println("class not found."); } assert c != null; printInfo(c); for (Class face : c.getInterfaces()) { printInfo(face); } Class up = c.getSuperclass(); Object object = null; try { object = up.newInstance(); } catch (InstantiationException e) { System.out.println("Ëé∑ÂèñÂÆû‰æãÂ§±Ë¥•."); } catch (IllegalAccessException e) { System.out.println("Êó†Ê≥ïËÆøÈóÆ."); } assert object != null; printInfo(object.getClass()); }}interface HasBatteries {}interface WaterProof {}interface Shoots {}class Toy { Toy() { } Toy(int i) { }}class FancyToy extends Toy implements HasBatteries, WaterProof, Shoots { FancyToy() { super(1); }} output: 12345678910111213141516171819202122Class name: com.typeinfo.FancyToy is interface? [false]Simple name: FancyToyCanonical name: com.typeinfo.FancyToy---------------Class name: com.typeinfo.HasBatteries is interface? [true]Simple name: HasBatteriesCanonical name: com.typeinfo.HasBatteries---------------Class name: com.typeinfo.WaterProof is interface? [true]Simple name: WaterProofCanonical name: com.typeinfo.WaterProof---------------Class name: com.typeinfo.Shoots is interface? [true]Simple name: ShootsCanonical name: com.typeinfo.Shoots---------------Class name: com.typeinfo.Toy is interface? [false]Simple name: ToyCanonical name: com.typeinfo.Toy---------------Process finished with exit code 0 Âú®ÁªôforName()ÊñπÊ≥ï‰º†ÈÄíÁ±ªÂêçÊòØÂøÖÈ°ª‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ®ÈôêÂÆöÂêç„ÄÇClassÁ±ªÂ∏∏Áî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÂàóË°®Ôºö ÊñπÊ≥ï ÊèèËø∞ getName() Ëé∑ÂèñÂÖ®ÈôêÂÆöÁ±ªÂêç getSimpleName() Ëé∑Âèñ‰∏çÂê´ÂåÖÁ±ªÂêç getCanonicalName() Âê´ÂåÖÂêçÁöÑÂÖ®ÈôêÂÆöÂêç getInterfaces() ClassÂØπË±°ÊâÄÂåÖÂê´ÁöÑÊé•Âè£ isInterface() Âà§Êñ≠ClassÂØπË±°ÊòØÂê¶ÊòØÊé•Âè£ newInstance() ËôöÊãüÊûÑÈÄ†Âô®(ËØ•Á±ªÂøÖÈ°ªÂê´ÊúâÈªòËÆ§ÊûÑÈÄ†Âô®) getSuperClass() Èó¥Êé•Ëé∑ÂèñClassÂØπË±°Âü∫Á±ª 14.2.1 Á±ªÂ≠óÈù¢Â∏∏ÈáèJavaËøòÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÂè¶‰∏ÄÁßçÊñπÊ≥ïÊù•ÁîüÊàêClassÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂºïÁî®ÔºåÂç≥‰ΩøÁî®Á±ªÂ≠óÈù¢Â∏∏ÈáèÔºå‰æãÂ¶Ç 1FancyToy.class; ËøôÊ†∑ÂÅöÊõ¥Âä†ÁÆÄÂçï„ÄÅÂÆâÂÖ®ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ÂÆÉÂú®ÁºñËØëÂô®Â∞±‰ºöÂèóÂà∞Ê£ÄÊü•ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂºÇÂ∏∏Ê£ÄÊü•ÔºåÂêåÊó∂Ê†πÈô§‰∫ÜÂØπforNam()ÊñπÊ≥ïÁöÑË∞ÉÁî®ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§Êõ¥Âä†È´òÊïà„ÄÇÁ±ªÂ≠óÈù¢Â∏∏ÈáèÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏ç‰ªÖÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÊôÆÈÄöÁöÑÁ±ªÔºå‰πüÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÊé•Âè£ÔºåÂü∫Êú¨Êï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûãÔºåÊï∞ÁªÑ„ÄÇÂØπ‰∫éÂü∫Êú¨ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑClassÂØπË±°„ÄÇËøòÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê†áÂáÜÂ≠óÊÆµTYPEÔºåTYPEÂ≠óÊÆµÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂºïÁî®ÔºåÊåáÂêëÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûãClassÂØπË±°„ÄÇÂª∫ËÆÆ‰ΩøÁî®.classÊñπÊ≥ïÔºå‰∏éÊôÆÈÄöÁ±ª‰øùÊåÅ‰∏ÄËá¥ Â≠óÈù¢Â∏∏Èáè Ê†áÂáÜTYPEÂ≠óÊÆµ boolean.class Boolean.class char.class Char.class byte.class Byte.class short.class Short.class int.class Integer.class long.class Long.class float.class Flocat.class double.class Double.class void.class Void.class ÂΩì‰ΩøÁî®.classÊù•ÂàõÂª∫ClassÂØπË±°ÂºïÁî®Êó∂Ôºå‰∏ç‰ºöËá™Âä®ÂàùÂßãÂåñËØ•ClassÂØπË±°ÔºåÂåÖÂê´‰∏â‰∏™ËøáÁ®ãÁöÑÂáÜÂ§áÔºö Âä†ËΩΩÔºöÁî±Á±ªÂä†ËΩΩÂô®ÊâßË°åÔºåÊü•ÊâæÂ≠óËäÇÁ†ÅÔºå‰∏∫Â≠óËäÇÁ†ÅÂàõÂª∫ClassÂØπË±°Ôºõ ÈìæÊé•ÔºöÈ™åËØÅÁ±ª‰∏≠ÁöÑÂ≠óËäÇÁ†ÅÔºå‰∏∫ÈùôÊÄÅÂüüÂàÜÈÖçÁ©∫Èó¥ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂøÖÈ°ªÁöÑËØùÔºåÂ∞ÜËß£ÊûêËøô‰∏™Á±ªÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÂØπÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ±ªÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÂºïÁî®Ôºõ ÂàùÂßãÂåñÔºöÂ¶ÇÊûúËØ•Á±ªÂÖ∑ÊúâË∂ÖÁ±ªÔºåÂàôÂØπÂÖ∂ËøõË°åÂàùÂßãÂåñÔºåÊâßË°åÈùôÊÄÅÂàùÂßãÂåñÂíåÈùôÊÄÅÂàùÂßãÂåñÂùó„ÄÇÂàùÂßãÂåñË¢´Âª∂ËøüÂà∞ÂØπÈùôÊÄÅÊñπÊ≥ïÊàñËÄÖÈùûÈùôÊÄÅÊï∞ÊçÆÂüüËøõË°åÈ¶ñÊ¨°ÂºïÁî®Êó∂ÊâßË°å„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748package com.typeinfo;import java.util.Random;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-07 19:07 */public class ClassInitailization { public static Random random = new Random(47); public static void main(String[] args) throws ClassNotFoundException { Class initable = Initable.class; System.out.println("after create initable ref."); System.out.println(Initable.staticFinal); System.out.println(Initable.staticFinal2); System.out.println(Initable2.staticNonFinal); Class initable3 = Class.forName("com.typeinfo.Initable3"); System.out.println("after create initable3."); System.out.println(Initable3.staticNonFinal); }}class Initable { static final int staticFinal = 47; static final int staticFinal2 = ClassInitailization.random.nextInt(1000); static { System.out.println("Initializing initable."); }}class Initable2 { static int staticNonFinal = 147; static { System.out.println("initializing initable2."); }}class Initable3 { static int staticNonFinal = 74; static { System.out.println("initializing initable3."); }} output: 1234567891011after create initable ref.47Initializing initable.258initializing initable2.147initializing initable3.after create initable3.74Process finished with exit code 0 ÂàùÂßãÂåñÊúâÊïàÁöÑ‰ΩìÁé∞‰∫Ü‚ÄùÊÉ∞ÊÄß‚ÄùÔºå‰ªéInitableÁöÑÂºïÁî®ÂàõÂª∫‰∏≠Áü•ÈÅì‰ΩøÁî®.classÂàõÂª∫ClassÂºïÁî®‰∏ç‰ºöÂºïÂèëÂàùÂßãÂåñÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰∫ßÁîüÂºïÁî®ÔºåClass.forName()Á´ãÂç≥ËøõË°å‰∫ÜÂàùÂßãÂåñ„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏Ä‰∏™static finalÂÄºÊòØÁºñËØëÊúüÂ∏∏ÈáèÔºåÈÇ£‰πàËøô‰∏™ÂÄº‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂØπÁ±ªËøõË°åÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ËøõË°åËØªÂèñ„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÂ∞Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂüüËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫static 14.2.2 Ê≥õÂåñÁöÑClassÂºïÁî®ClassÂºïÁî®ÊâÄË°®Á§∫ÁöÑÂ∞±ÊòØÂÆÉÊâÄÊåáÂêëÁöÑÁ±ªÁöÑÁ°ÆÂàáÁ±ªÂûãÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âà∂ÈÄ†Á±ªÁöÑÂÆû‰æãÔºåÂåÖÂê´Á±ªÁöÑÈùôÊÄÅÊàêÂëòÂíåÊñπÊ≥ï‰ª£Á†Å„ÄÇÂú®Java 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 10:22 */public class SimpleProxyDemo { public static void consumer(Interface inter) { inter.doSomething(); inter.somethingElse("banana"); } public static void main(String[] args) { consumer(new RealObject()); consumer(new ProxyObject(new RealObject())); }}interface Interface { void doSomething(); void somethingElse(String arg);}class RealObject implements Interface { @Override public void doSomething() { System.out.println("do something."); } @Override public void somethingElse(String arg) { System.out.println("do something else :" + arg); }}class ProxyObject implements Interface { private Interface proxied; public ProxyObject(Interface proxied) { this.proxied = proxied; } @Override public void doSomething() { System.out.println("proxy object do something."); proxied.doSomething(); } @Override public void somethingElse(String arg) { System.out.println("proxy object do something else: " + arg); proxied.somethingElse(arg); }} output: 12345678do something.do something else :bananaproxy object do something.do something.proxy object do something else: bananado something else :bananaProcess finished with exit code 0 ÂΩìÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÊâßË°å‰∏Ä‰∫õÈ¢ùÂ§ñÊìç‰ΩúÔºåÂêåÊó∂ÊÉ≥Â∞ÜËøô‰∫õÊìç‰Ωú‰ªé‚ÄùÂÆûÈôÖ‚ÄùÂØπË±°‰∏≠ÂàÜÁ¶ªÂá∫ÂéªÊó∂ÔºåÊàñËÄÖÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÊõ¥Âä†ÂÆπÊòìÁöÑÂÅöÂá∫‰øÆÊîπÊó∂‰ª£ÁêÜÊòØÂæàÊúâÁî®ÁöÑ„ÄÇ ÈÄöËøáË∞ÉÁî®ÈùôÊÄÅÊñπÊ≥ïProxy.newProxyInstance()ÂèØ‰ª•ÂàõÂª∫Âä®ÊÄÅ‰ª£ÁêÜÂØπË±°ÔºånewProxyInstance(ClassLoader loader, Class<?>[] interfaces, InvocationHandler h)Returns an instance of a proxy class for the specified interfaces that dispatches method invocations to the specified invocation handler. 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243package com.typeinfo;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;import java.lang.reflect.Method;import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 10:35 */public class SimpleDynamicProxy { public static void consumer(Interface inter) { inter.doSomething(); inter.somethingElse("Banana"); } public static void main(String[] args) { RealObject realObject = new RealObject(); consumer(realObject); Interface proxy = (Interface) Proxy.newProxyInstance(Interface.class.getClassLoader(), new Class[]{Interface.class}, new DynamicProxyHandler(realObject)); consumer(proxy); }}class DynamicProxyHandler implements InvocationHandler { private Object proxied; public DynamicProxyHandler(Object proxied) { this.proxied = proxied; } @Override public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable { System.out.println("proxy: " + proxy.getClass() + " .method: " + method + " .args: " + args); if (args != null) { for (Object object : args) { System.out.println(object + " "); } } return method.invoke(proxied, args); }} output: 123456789do something.do something else :Bananaproxy: class com.typeinfo.$Proxy0 .method: public abstract void com.typeinfo.Interface.doSomething() .args: nulldo something.proxy: class com.typeinfo.$Proxy0 .method: public abstract void com.typeinfo.Interface.somethingElse(java.lang.String) .args: [Ljava.lang.Object;@12a3a380Banana do something else :BananaProcess finished with exit code 0 14.8 Á©∫ÂØπË±°ÂΩìÊó∂Áî®ÂÜÖÁΩÆÁöÑnullÂéªË°®Á§∫Á©∫ÂØπË±°Êó∂ÔºåÂú®ÊØèÊ¨°‰ΩøÁî®Ëøô‰∏™ÂØπË±°ÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÂÖàÂà§Êñ≠ËØ•ÂØπË±°ÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫nullÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂà§Êñ≠Èô§‰∫ÜÁî®Êù•‰∫ßÁîüNullPointerException‰πãÂ§ñÔºåÊ≤°Êúâ‰ªª‰ΩïÂ∏ÆÂä©ÔºåËøò‰ºö‰∫ßÁîüÂ§ßÈáèÂÜó‰Ωô‰ª£Á†Å„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨Â∏åÊúõÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Á©∫ÂØπË±°ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Êé•Êî∂‰º†‰º†ÁªôÂÆÉÊâÄ‰ª£Ë°®ÁöÑÂØπË±°Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂ∞ÜËøîÂõûË°®Á§∫ËØ•ÂØπË±°‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®ÁöÑ‰ªª‰ΩïÁúüÂÆûÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÄº„ÄÇÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÊòØÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê†áËÆ∞Êé•Âè£„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:02 */public class NullPerson extends Person implements Null { private NullPerson() { super("None", "None", "None"); } public String toString() { return "NullPerson"; } public static final Person Null = new NullPerson();}interface Null {}class Person { public final String first; public final String last; public final String address; public Person(String first, String last, String address) { this.first = first; this.last = last; this.address = address; } @Override public String toString() { return "Person{" + "first='" + first + '\'' + ", last='" + last + '\'' + ", address='" + address + '\'' + '}'; }} 14.9 Êé•Âè£‰∏éÁ±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØinterfaceÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁßçÈáçË¶ÅÁõÆÊ†áÂ∞±ÊòØÂÖÅËÆ∏ÈöîÁ¶ªÊûÑ‰ª∂ÔºåËøõËÄåÈôç‰ΩéËÄ¶ÂêàÂ∫¶ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁºñÂÜôÊé•Âè£ÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Ëøô‰∏ÄÁõÆÊ†áÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÈÄöËøáÁ±ªÂûã‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåËøôÁßçËÄ¶ÂêàÊÄßËøòÊòØ‰ºö‰º†Êí≠Âá∫Âéª„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:13 */public class InterfaceViolation { public static void main(String[] args) { A a = new B(); a.f(); System.out.println(a.getClass().getCanonicalName()); if (a instanceof B) { B b = (B) a; b.g(); } }}interface A { void f();}class B implements A { @Override public void f() { } public void g() { }} aË¢´ÂΩì‰ΩúBÂÆûÁé∞ÔºåÈÄöËøáËΩ¨Âûã‰∏∫BÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Ë∞ÉÁî®A‰∏≠‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÁßçËß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ≥ïÊòØÁõ¥Êé•Â£∞ÊòéÔºå‰ΩøÁî®ÂÆûÈôÖÁöÑÁ±ªËÄå‰∏çÊòØÊé•Âè£„ÄÇÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÊñπÂºèÊòØÂØπÂÆûÁé∞‰ΩøÁî®ÂåÖËÆøÈóÆÊùÉÈôêÔºåËøôÊ†∑Âú®ÂåÖÂ§ñ‰æøÊó†Ê≥ïËÆøÈóÆ„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930package com.typeinfo;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:27 */public class HiddenC { public static A makeA() { return new C(); }}class C implements A { @Override public void f() { } public void g() { } void u() { } protected void v() { } private void w() { }} Âç≥‰Ωø‰ªémakeA()ËøîÂõûÁöÑÊòØCÁ±ªÂûãÔºåÂú®ÂåÖÂ§ñ‰æùÁÑ∂Êó†Ê≥ï‰ΩøÁî®A‰πãÂ§ñÁöÑ‰ªª‰ΩïÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132package com.typeinfo;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;import java.lang.reflect.Method;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:30 */public class HiddenImplementation { public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException { A a = HiddenC.makeA(); a.f(); System.out.println(a.getClass().getCanonicalName()); if (a instanceof C) { C c = (C) a; c.g(); } callHiddenMethod(a, "g"); callHiddenMethod(a, "v"); callHiddenMethod(a, "u"); callHiddenMethod(a, "w"); } static void callHiddenMethod(Object object, String methodName) throws NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException { Method g = object.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(methodName); g.setAccessible(true); g.invoke(object); }} output: 123456789public f().com.typeinfo.Cpublic g().public g().protected v().package u().private w().Process finished with exit code 0 ÈÄöËøáÂèçÂ∞ÑÔºå‰ªçÊóßÂèØ‰ª•Ë∞ÉÁî®ÊâÄÊúâÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÁîöËá≥ÊòØprivateÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁü•ÈÅìÊñπÊ≥ïÂêçÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âú®MethodÂØπË±°‰∏äË∞ÉÁî®setAccessible(true)„ÄÇÁîöËá≥‰ΩøÁî®ÂèëÂ∏ÉÁºñËØëÂêéÁöÑ‰ª£Á†Å‰πüÊó†Ê≥ïÈòªÊ≠¢ËøôÁßçÊÉÖÂÜµÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Âú®ÂèëÂ∏ÉÁöÑjdk‰∏≠ÊúâÂèçÁºñËØëÂô®‰æøÂèØÁ™ÅÁ†¥Ëøô‰∏ÄÈôêÂà∂„ÄÇÂÜÖÈÉ®Á±ª‰∏éÂåøÂêçÁ±ª‰πüÊó†Ê≥ïÈòªÊ≠¢ÂèçÂ∞ÑÂà∞ËææÂπ∂Ë∞ÉÁî®ÈùûÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ËÆøÈóÆÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849package com.typeinfo;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:46 */public class InnerImplementation { public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException { A a = InnerA.makeA(); a.f(); System.out.println(a.getClass().getName()); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "g"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "u"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "v"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "w"); }}class InnerA { private static class C implements A { @Override public void f() { System.out.println("C.f()"); } public void g() { System.out.println("C.g()"); } void u() { System.out.println("C.u()"); } protected void v() { System.out.println("C.v()"); } private void w() { System.out.println("C.w()"); } } public static A makeA(){ return new C(); }} output: 12345678C.f()com.typeinfo.InnerA$CC.g()C.u()C.v()C.w()Process finished with exit code 0 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647package com.typeinfo;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018-06-08 11:51 */public class AnonymousImplementation { public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException { A a = AnonymousA.makeA(); a.f(); System.out.println(a.getClass().getName()); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "g"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "u"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "v"); HiddenImplementation.callHiddenMethod(a, "w"); }}class AnonymousA { public static A makeA() { return new A() { @Override public void f() { System.out.println("public c.f()"); } public void g() { System.out.println("public c.g()"); } void u() { System.out.println("package u()"); } protected void v() { System.out.println("protected v()"); } private void w() { System.out.println("private w()"); } }; }} output: 12345678public c.f()com.typeinfo.AnonymousA$1public c.g()package u()protected v()private w()Process finished with exit code 0

entry.title: ÂÜôÂú®Êñ∞Âπ¥Êù•‰∏¥‰πãÈôÖ
entry.content: ÂÜôÂú®Êñ∞Âπ¥Âà∞Êù•‰πãÈôÖ ‰ªäÂ§©ÊòØÂÜúÂéÜËÖäÊúà‰∫åÂçÅ‰∏ÉÔºåË∑ùÁ¶ªÊñ∞Âπ¥Âè™Êúâ‰∏âÂ§©ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÊòØÂ•ΩÂ§öÂêå‰∫ãÈÉΩÂøôÁùÄËµ∂ËΩ¶ÂõûÂÆ∂„ÄÅ ËøòË¶ÅËµ∞ÈÇ£‰∫õ‰ªéÊù•Ê≤°ËÆ∞Ê∏ÖÁöÑËØ∑ÂÅáÊµÅÁ®ãÔºåÈÇ£‰ªäÂ§©Âíå‰∏Ä‰∏™Âπ≥Â∏∏ÁöÑÂë®‰∫îÂπ∂Êó†‰∫åÊ†∑„ÄÇÊ≤°ÊúâÁâπÂà´ÁöÑÊÑüËßâÔºåÂè™ÊòØÈöêÁ∫¶‰∏≠Âú®ÊèêÈÜíËá™Â∑±ËÆ∞ÂæóÊî∂ÊãæË°åÊùé„ÄÇ Êó©‰∏äÊâçÂõõÁÇπ‰∏çÂà∞ÔºåËØ∑‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÂ§©ÂÅáÊèêÂâçÂõûÂÆ∂ÁöÑËàçÂèãÂ∞±Â∑≤Áªè‰πí‰πí‰πì‰πìÁöÑÂÆ¢ÂéÖÊî∂ÊãæË°åÊùé‰∫Ü„ÄÇËµ∂ÂáåÊô®‰∫îÁÇπÁöÑËΩ¶ËøôÁßç‰∫ãÊÉÖÊàëÊÉ≥ËøôËæàÂ≠ê‰πü‰∏ç‰ºöÂèëÁîüÂú®ÊàëË∫´‰∏ä„ÄÇËàçÂèãËµ∞‰∫ÜÔºåÊàëÂç¥‰∏ÄÁõ¥Ê≤°Áù°ÁùÄÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞ÂÖ≠ÁÇπÂ§öÂ§©‰∫Æ‰∫ÜÊâçËø∑Ëø∑Á≥äÁ≥äÂèàÁù°‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰ºöÂÑøÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂéªÂÖ¨Âè∏„ÄÇ Áõ∏ÊØî‰πã‰∏ãÔºåÊàëËøòÊòØÊõ¥ÂñúÊ¨¢‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏äÁè≠ÁöÑÊÑüËßâÔºåËÄ≥Êú∫ÂæÄËÄ≥Êúµ‰∏ÄÂ°ûÔºå‰∏ÄË∑ØÊ≤âÊµ∏Âú®Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑ‰∏ñÁïå‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏∫Êñ∞ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂ§©Ë∞ÉÊï¥ÂøÉÊÄÅÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞ÂÖ¨‰∫§Âà∞Á´ôÔºåÂîØ‰∏ÄÁöÑÁº∫ÊÜæÂèØËÉΩÂ∞±ÊòØËøôÊÆµË∑ØÁ®ãÂè™ÊúâÁü≠Áü≠ÁöÑÂçÅÂàÜÈíü„ÄÇ ‰ªäÂπ¥‰ª•Êù•ÔºåÊÑüËßâÊó∂Èó¥ËøáÂæóË∂äÊù•Ë∂äÂø´Ôºå‰ªø‰ΩõÊØèÊ¨°ÁúãÊó•ÂéÜÔºåÈÉΩ‰ºöÂèëÁé∞‰ªäÂ§©ÊòØÂë®‰∫î„ÄÇËØ¥Âà∞ËøôÈáåÔºåÊàëÊíáËøáÂ§¥Áúã‰∫ÜÁúãÊ°å‰∏äÂæóÊó•ÂéÜÔºåËøòÂÅúÁïôÂú®2017Âπ¥12Êúà31Êó•ÔºåÁ´üÁÑ∂Â∑≤ÁªèËøáÂéªËøô‰πà‰πÖ‰∫Ü„ÄÇËøôÊú¨Êó•ÂéÜÈô™ÁùÄÊàë‰ªéÂåó‰∫¨Âà∞Â§ßËøûÔºåÁ´üÁÑ∂Â∑≤ÁªèËøáÂéª‰∫ÜËøô‰πà‰πÖ„ÄÇ Âú®ÊØè‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑÊó∂Èó¥ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞Êù•‰πãÈôÖÔºåÊÄªÊòØÂøç‰∏ç‰ΩèË¶ÅÂõûÂ§¥Áúã‰∏ÄÁúã„ÄÇ Ëøô‰∏ÄÂπ¥Ôºå1ÊúàÂà∞6ÊúàÂú®Â≠¶Ê†°ÂÅöÊØï‰∏öËÆæËÆ°ÔºåÂíåÂá†‰∏™Âú®ÂâçÂá†Âπ¥ÈÉΩÊ≤°ÊúâÂ§öÂ∞ëÊù•ÂæÄÁöÑÂêåÂ≠¶Â∫¶Ëøá‰∫ÜÊÑâÂø´ÁöÑÂçäÂπ¥Êó∂Èó¥ÔºåÊâçÂèëÁé∞ÔºåÂéüÊù•Ë∫´Ëæπ‰∏ÄÁõ¥ÊúâËøô‰πàÂ§öÊúâË∂£Áé©ÂæóÊù•ÁöÑ‰∫∫ÔºåËøôÂ∑Æ‰∏çÂ§öÁÆóÊòØÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÂõõÂπ¥ÊúÄÂ•ΩÁöÑÂõûÂøÜ‰πã‰∏Ä‰∫Ü„ÄÇ 4ÊúàÂàùÂéª‰∫ÜË•øÊ±üËãóÂØ®ÔºåÂçóÊñπÈ∏üËØ≠Ëä±È¶ôÁöÑÊò•Â§©ËøúÊØîÂåóÊñπÁöÑÂáõÂÜΩÂØíÈ£éÊõ¥Âê∏Âºï‰∫∫„ÄÇ 7ÊúàÔºåÊØï‰∏ö„ÄÇÁ§æ‰ºöË∫´‰ªΩÁöÑÂèòÂåñÁÆóÊòØ‰ªäÂπ¥ÊúÄÂ§ßÁöÑÊîπÂèòÔºåÁúãÂà∞Ë∫´ËæπÂæàÂ§ö‰∫∫ÂØπÂ≠¶ÁîüÊó∂‰ª£ÁöÑÁïôÊÅãÔºåÊàëÊÑüÂà∞Âá†ÂàÜÂ∫ÜÂπ∏„ÄÇÁõ∏ÊØî‰∫éÂ≠¶ÁîüÔºå‰∏äÁè≠ÊóèÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩÊõ¥ËÆ©ÊàëÂÆâÂøÉ„ÄÇ entry.title: LeetCode‰πã3Sum
entry.content: ‰∏çÁü•ÈÅìË∫´ËæπÁé∞Âú®ËøòÊúâÊ≤°ÊúâÁî®QQÈü≥‰πêÁöÑ‰∫∫„ÄÇ È¢òÁõÆÂÜÖÂÆπËæìÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï∞ÁªÑÔºå‰æãÂ¶Ç{-1 0 1 2 -1 -4}Ôºå‰ªéÊï∞ÁªÑ‰∏≠Êâæ‰∏â‰∏™Êï∞Ôºàa,b,cÔºâÔºå‰ΩøÂæóÂÖ∂Âíå0ÔºåËæìÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÔºàa,b,cÔºâÁªÑÂêà„ÄÇ Ë¶ÅÊ±Çabc‰∏çËÉΩÈáçÂ§çÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îa<=b<=c„ÄÇ ‰æãÔºö S = {-1, 0, 1, 2, -1, -4}Ôºõ ËæìÂá∫Ôºö (-1, 0 ,1) (-1, -1, 2) ÂàÜÊûê‰∏ÄÁúãÂà∞È¢òÁõÆÔºå‰∏çÈóÆ‰ª£Á†ÅË°åÊï∞Ôºå‰∏çÈóÆÊó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶Ôºå‰æøÊéíÂá∫‰∏â‰∏™Âæ™ÁéØ„ÄÇ„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÂæ™ÁéØÈùûÂ∏∏ËÄóÊó∂ÔºåÊòæÁÑ∂‰∏çÊòØÈ¢òÁõÆÁöÑÊú¨ÊÑè„ÄÇÊÉ≥‰∫ÜÂ•ΩÈïøÊó∂Èó¥Ê≤°Êúâ‰ªÄ‰πàËøõÂ±ï„ÄÇ ÂÖàÂ∞ÜÁªôÂÆöÊï∞ÁªÑÊéíÂ∫èÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊåáÂÆö‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï∞ÔºåÂú®Êï∞ÁªÑ‰∏≠ÊâæÂá∫‰∏§‰∏™Êï∞Âπ∂‰∏îËøô‰∏§‰∏™Êï∞ÁöÑÂíåÊòØÁõÆÊ†áÊï∞ÂÄºÁöÑÁõ∏ÂèçÊï∞Ôºö„ÄêLeetCode„Äë3Sum Ëß£È¢òÊä•Âëä Âú®ÁΩë‰∏äÊâæÂà∞‰∫ÜÁØáÊØîËæÉÊúâÊñ∞ÊÑèÁöÑÊñáÁ´†Ôºö[3Sum algorithm - ÈùûÂ∏∏ÂÆπÊòìÁêÜËß£ÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞ Ôºàjava)] „ÄÇ ÊúÄÂêéÂèëÁé∞Áª¥Âü∫ÁôæÁßë‰∏≠Â∞±ÊúâÊî∂ÂΩïÔºöÁª¥Âü∫ÁôæÁßë‚Äî3SUM ÔºåËøòÊúâÊõ¥‰∏ÄËà¨ÁöÑÊÉÖÂΩ¢ N SUM„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819sort(S);for i=0 to n-3 do a = S[i]; start = i+1; end = n-1; while (start < end) do b = S[start] c = S[end]; if (a+b+c == 0) then output a, b, c; // Continue search for all triplet combinations summing to zero. end = end - 1 else if (a+b+c > 0) then end = end - 1; else start = start + 1; end endend ‰º™‰ª£Á†ÅËøòÊå∫ÂÆπÊòìÁêÜËß£ÁöÑ„ÄÇ OtherÂõ†‰∏∫Áü•‰πé‰∏äÊúâ‰∫∫ÂÆ£Áß∞ËØÅÊòé‰∫ÜÂì•Âæ∑Â∑¥Ëµ´ÁåúÊÉ≥ÁöÑÂéüÂõ†ÔºåËøô‰∏§Â§©ËøòÁâπÊÑè‰∫ÜËß£‰∫Ü‰∏ãÁåúÊÉ≥ËØÅÊòéÁöÑÂéÜÂè≤Ôºå‚Äú1+2‚Äù„ÄÅ‚Äú1+3‚Äù‰πãÁ±ªÁöÑËØÅÊòéÔºåËôΩÁÑ∂‰∏ÄÁÇπ‰πüÊ≤°ÁúãÊáÇ„ÄÇÊÑüËßâÊï∞Â≠¶ÁúüÁöÑÂæàÊúâÈ≠ÖÂäõÔºå‰∏•Ë∞®Ê∏ÖÊô∞ÁöÑÈÄªËæëÔºåÁ≤æÂ¶ôÂÆåÁæéÁöÑÁªìËÆ∫ÔºåËá™ÁÑ∂Áïå‰∏≠ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂàáÊØèÊó∂ÊØèÂàªÈÉΩÂú®ÈÅµÂæ™ÁùÄÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑËßÑÂæãËøêË°åÔºåÊõ¥Âä†ÊÑüÊÖ®‰∫é‰∫∫Á±ªÁöÑÊô∫ÊÖßÔºåÈÉΩÊâæ‰∏çÂà∞ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑËµûÁæéÁöÑËØç‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ‚ÄúË∂ÖË∂äÊï∞‚Äù„ÄÅ‚ÄúÈªÑÈáëÂàÜÂâ≤‚Äù„ÄÅ‚ÄúÂì•Âæ∑Â∑¥Ëµ´ÁåúÊÉ≥‚Äù„ÄÅ‚ÄúÈªéÊõºÁåúÊÉ≥‚Äù‚Ä¶ ÂÅú‰∏ãÊÄùÁª™ÔºåÂõûÂà∞Áé∞ÂÆûÔºöÂΩì‰Ω†ÁêÜËß£ÂÆÉÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄô‰Ω†ËßâÂæóËøõÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂ§©Â†ÇÔºåÂΩì‰Ω†‰∏çÁêÜËß£ÂÆÉÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄô‰Ω†‰ªø‰ΩõËøõÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂú∞Áã±ÔºåÁúãÂì≠‰∫Ü‚Ä¶

}} ÁºñÂÜô‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæëÔºåÊúçÂä°Ôºõ ËøêË°å‰∏ªÁ®ãÂ∫èÊµãËØïÔºõ ÊâìÂåÖjarÂåÖÔºö 12345678<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin> </plugins></build> ËøêË°åjarÂåÖÔºö 1java -jar xxx.jar 1.5 HelloWorldÂéüÁêÜÊé¢Á©∂POMÊñá‰ª∂Ôºö Áà∂È°πÁõÆÔºö 12345<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId></dependency>Áà∂È°πÁõÆÔºö SpringBootÁöÑÁâàÊú¨‰ª≤Ë£Å‰∏≠ÂøÉÔºåÂØºÂÖ•‰æùËµñ‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂÜôÁâàÊú¨Âè∑„ÄÇ ÂØºÂÖ•ÁöÑ‰æùËµñÔºö 123456<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency></dependencies> spring-boot-starter-webÔºö Âú∫ÊôØÂêØÂä®Âô®ÔºöÂ∏ÆÊàë‰ª¨ÂØºÂÖ•webÊ®°ÂùóÊ≠£Â∏∏ËøêË°åÊâÄÈúÄÁöÑ‰æùËµñÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂Ôºõ Â∞ÜÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÂú∫ÊôØÊäΩÂèñÂá∫Êù•ÔºåÂÅöÊàêÂêØÂä®Âô®ÔºåÂè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®È°πÁõÆ‰∏≠ÂØºÂÖ•Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑstarterÔºåÊâÄÊúâÁöÑ‰æùËµñÈÉΩ‰ºöË¢´ÂØºÂÖ•ÔºåÁâàÊú¨Áî±spring-bootËá™Âä®ÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÄÇ 1.6 ‰∏ªÁ®ãÂ∫èÁ±ªÂéüÁêÜÊé¢Á©∂123456789101112131415package com.hello;import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 18-9-9 ‰∏ãÂçà2:28 */@SpringBootApplicationpublic class MainApp { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(MainApp.class, args); }} @SpringBootApplicationÊ†áÊ≥®Âú®Êüê‰∏™Á±ª‰∏äÔºåÊåáÂÆöSpringBootÁöÑ‰∏ªÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªÔºåÁî±Ëøô‰∏™Á±ªÊù•ÂêØÂä®SpringBootÂ∫îÁî®„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314@Target({ElementType.TYPE})@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)@Documented@Inherited@SpringBootConfiguration@EnableAutoConfiguration@ComponentScan( excludeFilters = {@Filter( type = FilterType.CUSTOM, classes = {TypeExcludeFilter.class}), @Filter( type = FilterType.CUSTOM, classes = {AutoConfigurationExcludeFilter.class})} @SpringBootConfigurationÔºöÊ†áÊ≥®Âú®Êüê‰∏™Á±ª‰∏äÔºåË°®Á§∫ËØ•Á±ªÊòØSpringBootÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ª„ÄÇ @ConfigurationÔºöÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ª‰∏äÊ†áÊ≥®ËØ•Á±ª„ÄÇÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ª‰πüÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ôºö@ComponentÔºõ @EnableAutoConfigurationÔºöÂºÄÂêØËá™Âä®ÈÖçÁΩÆÔºå 1ÈúÄË¶ÅÈÖçÁΩÆÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÁî±SpringBootËá™Âä®ÈÖçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ 12@AutoConfigurationPackage@Import({AutoConfigurationImportSelector.class}) 123@AutoConfigurationPackageÔºöËá™Âä®ÈÖçÁΩÆÂåÖÔºåÁªôÂÆπÂô®ÂØºÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÔºåÂØºÂÖ•ÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂Áî±AutoConfigurationPackage.RegistrarÔºõÂ∞Ü‰∏ªÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÂèä‰ª•‰∏ãÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÂ≠êÂåÖÈáåÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê∑ªÂä†Âà∞SpringÂÆπÂô®‰∏≠„ÄÇ 123@Import({Registrar.class})public @interface AutoConfigurationPackage {} 123@ImportÔºöÁªôÂÆπÂô®‰∏≠ÂØºÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∫õÁªÑ‰ª∂ÔºöAutoConfigurationImportSelectorÔºöÈÄâÊã©Âì™‰∫õÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂØºÂÖ•„ÄÇ ÁªôÂÆπÂô®‰∏≠ÂØºÂÖ•Ëá™Âä®ÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªÔºàxxxAutoConfigurationÔºâÔºöÁªôÂÆπÂô®‰∏≠ÂØºÂÖ•Âú∫ÊôØÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂Âπ∂ÈÖçÁΩÆÂ•ΩËøô‰∫õÁªÑ‰ª∂„ÄÇ 12345protected List<String> getCandidateConfigurations(AnnotationMetadata metadata, AnnotationAttributes attributes) { List<String> configurations = SpringFactoriesLoader.loadFactoryNames(this.getSpringFactoriesLoaderFactoryClass(), this.getBeanClassLoader()); Assert.notEmpty(configurations, "No auto configuration classes found in META-INF/spring.factories. If you are using a custom packaging, make sure that file is correct."); return configurations;} 2.2.1ÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂Ê≥®ÂÖ•Ôºöapplication.ymlÊñá‰ª∂Ôºö 1234567891011121314151617server: port: 8081person: name: Âº†‰∏â age: 18 alive: true birth: 2018/09/11 classes: - v1 - v2 map: k1: v1 k2: v2 dog: ErrorPageCustomizerÔºöÁ≥ªÁªüÂá∫Áé∞ÈîôËØØÔºåÊù•Âà∞/errorËØ∑Ê±ÇËøõË°åÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºöweb.xmlÔºõ DefaultErrorViewResolverÔºõ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526static { Map<Series, String> views = new EnumMap<>(Series.class); views.put(Series.CLIENT_ERROR, "4xx"); views.put(Series.SERVER_ERROR, "5xx"); SERIES_VIEWS = Collections.unmodifiableMap(views);}@Overridepublic ModelAndView resolveErrorView(HttpServletRequest request, HttpStatus status, Map<String, Object> model) { ModelAndView modelAndView = resolve(String.valueOf(status), model); if (modelAndView == null && SERIES_VIEWS.containsKey(status.series())) { modelAndView = resolve(SERIES_VIEWS.get(status.series()), model); } return modelAndView;}private ModelAndView resolve(String viewName, Map<String, Object> model) { String errorViewName = "error/" + viewName; TemplateAvailabilityProvider provider = this.templateAvailabilityProviders .getProvider(errorViewName, this.applicationContext); if (provider != null) { return new ModelAndView(errorViewName, model); } return resolveResource(errorViewName, model);} ÂÆöÂà∂Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÈîôËØØÈ°µÈù¢Ôºö ResponseEntity<>(body, status);} Â∞ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÈîôËØØ‰ø°ÊÅØÊê∫Â∏¶Ôºö ÂìçÂ∫îÊï∞ÊçÆÁî±getErrorAttributes()Ëé∑ÂèñÔºö ÂΩìÊúçÂä°Ë∂äÊù•Ë∂äÂ§öÔºåÂÆπÈáèÁöÑËØÑ‰º∞ÔºåÂ∞èÊúçÂä°ËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑÊµ™Ë¥πÁ≠âÈóÆÈ¢òÈÄêÊ∏êÊòæÁé∞ÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂ÈúÄÂ¢ûÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë∞ÉÂ∫¶‰∏≠ÂøÉÂü∫‰∫éËÆøÈóÆÂéãÂäõÂÆûÊó∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜÈõÜÁæ§ÂÆπÈáèÔºåÊèêÈ´òÈõÜÁæ§Âà©Áî®Áéá„ÄÇÊ≠§Êó∂ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊèêÈ´òÊú∫Âô®Âà©Áî®ÁéáÁöÑËµÑÊ∫êË∞ÉÂ∫¶ÂíåÊ≤ªÁêÜ‰∏≠ÂøÉ(SOA)ÊòØÂÖ≥ÈîÆ„ÄÇ RPCRPCÔºàRemote Procedure CallÔºâ‚ÄîËøúÁ®ãËøáÁ®ãË∞ÉÁî®ÔºåÂÆÉÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÈÄöËøáÁΩëÁªú‰ªéËøúÁ®ãËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫Á®ãÂ∫è‰∏äËØ∑Ê±ÇÊúçÂä°ÔºåËÄå‰∏çÈúÄË¶Å‰∫ÜËß£Â∫ïÂ±ÇÁΩëÁªúÊäÄÊúØÁöÑÂçèËÆÆ„ÄÇRPCÂçèËÆÆÂÅáÂÆöÊüê‰∫õ‰º†ËæìÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÂ≠òÂú®ÔºåÂ¶ÇTCPÊàñUDPÔºå‰∏∫ÈÄö‰ø°Á®ãÂ∫è‰πãÈó¥Êê∫Â∏¶‰ø°ÊÅØÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇÂú®OSIÁΩëÁªúÈÄö‰ø°Ê®°Âûã‰∏≠ÔºåRPCË∑®Ë∂ä‰∫Ü‰º†ËæìÂ±ÇÂíåÂ∫îÁî®Â±Ç„ÄÇRPC‰ΩøÂæóÂºÄÂèëÂåÖÊã¨ÁΩëÁªúÂàÜÂ∏ÉÂºèÂ§öÁ®ãÂ∫èÂú®ÂÜÖÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊõ¥Âä†ÂÆπÊòì„ÄÇ ËøúÁ®ãËøáÁ®ãË∞ÉÁî®ÔºöÂ∫èÂàóÂåñÂíåÁΩëÁªúÈÄö‰ø°„ÄÇ ÁâπÊÄß‰∏ÄËßà Èù¢ÂêëÊé•Âè£‰ª£ÁêÜÁöÑÈ´òÊÄßËÉΩRPCË∞ÉÁî® Êô∫ËÉΩË¥üËΩΩÂùáË°° ÊúçÂä°Ëá™Âä®Ê≥®ÂÜå‰∏éÂèëÁé∞ È´òÂ∫¶ÂèØÊâ©Â±ïËÉΩÂäõ ËøêË°åÊúüÊµÅÈáèË∞ÉÂ∫¶ ÂèØËßÜÂåñÁöÑÊúçÂä°Ê≤ªÁêÜ‰∏éËøêÁª¥ dubboÂ∫îÁî®Êû∂ÊûÑ dubboÂø´ÈÄüÂêØÂä®dubboÂø´ÈÄüÂêØÂä® dubboÂÆû‰æã1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738package bean;import java.io.Serializable;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà7:45 */public class UserAddress implements Serializable { private Integer id; private String userId; private String userAddress; private String consignee; private String phoneNum; private boolean isDefault; public UserAddress(Integer id, String userId, String userAddress, String consignee, String phoneNum, boolean isDefault) { this.id = id; this.userId = userId; this.userAddress = userAddress; this.consignee = consignee; this.phoneNum = phoneNum; this.isDefault = isDefault; } @Override public String toString() { return "UserAddress{" + "id=" + id + ", userId='" + userId + '\'' + ", userAddress='" + userAddress + '\'' + ", consignee='" + consignee + '\'' + ", phoneNum='" + phoneNum + '\'' + ", isDefault=" + isDefault + '}'; }} 123456789package service;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà7:46 */public interface OrderService { String initOrder(String userId);} 12345678910111213package service;import bean.UserAddress;import java.util.List;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà7:46 */public interface UserService { List<UserAddress> getUserAddressList(String userId);} 1234567891011121314151617181920212223package service.impl;import bean.UserAddress;import com.alibaba.dubbo.config.annotation.Service;import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;import service.UserService;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.List;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà7:49 */@Service@Componentpublic class UserServiceImpl implements UserService { public List<UserAddress> getUserAddressList(String userId) { UserAddress userAddress1 = new UserAddress(1, "001", "‰∫∫Ê∞ëÂπøÂú∫", "100", "230189", true); UserAddress userAddress2 = new UserAddress(2, "002", "ÊñáÂåñÂÖ¨Âõ≠", "101", "230190", false); return Arrays.asList(userAddress1, userAddress2); }} 123456789101112131415161718package com.dubbo.service.consumer.service.impl;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà8:43 */@Servicepublic class OrderServiceImpl implements OrderService { @Autowired private UserService userService; public String initOrder(String userId) { return userService.getUserAddressList(userId); }} 1234567891011121314151617181920212223package com.dubbo.service.consumer.controller;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ResponseBody;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/12/2 ‰∏ãÂçà9:00 */@Controllerpublic class OrderController { @Autowired private OrderService orderService; @ResponseBody @RequestMapping("/initOrder.do") public String initOrder(@RequestParam("userId") String userId) { return orderService.initOrder(userId); }} 12345678910111213package com.dubbo.service.consumer;import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;@EnableDubbo@SpringBootApplicationpublic class DubboDemoApplication { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(DubboDemoApplication.class, args); }} 123456789101112131415161718192021# Spring boot applicationspring.application.name = dubbo-provider-demoserver.port = 9090management.port = 9091# Base packages to scan Dubbo Components (e.g., @Service, @Reference)dubbo.scan.basePackages = com.alibaba.boot.dubbo.demo.provider.service# Dubbo Config properties## ApplicationConfig Beandubbo.application.id = dubbo-provider-demodubbo.application.name = dubbo-provider-demo## ProtocolConfig Beandubbo.protocol.id = dubbodubbo.protocol.name = dubbodubbo.protocol.port = 12345## RegistryConfig Beandubbo.registry.id = my-registrydubbo.registry.address = N/A

ÂÖàÂéª‰∫ÜÊòüÊµ∑ÂÖ¨Âõ≠Êµ∑ËæπÔºåÊãç‰∫ÜÂá†Âº†ÁÖßÁâáÔºåÂ§©Ê∞î‰∏çÁÆóÂ§™Â∑ÆÔºåÈ£é‰πü‰∏çÊòØÂæàÂ§ß„ÄÇ ÁÑ∂ÂêéÂéª‰∫ÜÂñúÂÆ∂Âæ∑Âñù‰∫ÜÁÇπ‰∏úË•øÔºåÊú¨Êù•ÊâìÁÆóÂéªÂ∏ÇÂÜÖÁöÑÔºå‰∏ãËΩ¶‰∫ÜÊâçÂèëÁé∞‰∏§‰∫∫ËØ¥ÁöÑ‰∏çÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âú∞Êñπ„ÄÇ„ÄÇÈò¥Â∑ÆÈò≥ÈîôÁöÑÂéª‰∫ÜÂíåÂπ≥ÂπøÂú∫ÔºåÈÄõ‰∫ÜÊó†Âç∞ËâØÂìÅ„ÄÅÂçéÊ∂¶Ë∂ÖÂ∏Ç„ÄÅÊï∞Á†Å‰π¶Â∫óËøòÂéª‰π∞‰∫ÜÈ¶ôËñ∞ÔºåÂêÉ‰∫ÜÁÅ´ÈîÖ„ÄÇ entry.title: SpringÂ≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞-Á¨¨‰∏âÁ´†-È´òÁ∫ßË£ÖÈÖç
entry.content: Á¨¨‰∏âÁ´†ÔºöÈ´òÁ∫ßË£ÖÈÖç Êú¨Á´†ÂÜÖÂÆπÔºö Spring profile Êù°‰ª∂ÂåñÁöÑbeanÂ£∞Êòé Ëá™Âä®Ë£ÖÈÖç‰∏éÊ≠ß‰πâÊÄß beanÁöÑ‰ΩúÁî®Âüü SpringË°®ËææÂºèËØ≠Ë®Ä 3.1 ÁéØÂ¢É‰∏éprofileÂú®ËΩØ‰ª∂ÂºÄÂèëÁöÑ‰∏çÂêåÈò∂ÊÆµÈúÄË¶Å‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÁéØÂ¢ÉÂíåÈÖçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ 1234567@Bean(destroyMethod = "shutdown")public DataSource dataSource() { return new EmbeddedDatabaseBuilder() .addScript("classpath:ch3.sql") .addScript("classpath:ch3.1.sql") .build();} ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÈÄÇÂ∫îÁéØÂ¢ÉÊõ¥Êç¢ÁöÑÈúÄÊ±ÇÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Â∞ÜÊâÄÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÁ±ªÈÖçÁΩÆÂà∞ÊØè‰∏™bean‰∏≠ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®ÊûÑÂª∫Èò∂ÊÆµÈÄâÊã©ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑbeanÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØ‰ªéÂºÄÂèëÁéØÂ¢ÉÂàáÊç¢Âà∞Áîü‰∫ßÁéØÂ¢ÉÊó∂ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂèëÁîüÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ 3.1.1 ÈÖçÁΩÆprofile beanSpring‰∏∫Ê≠§ÁßçÂú∫ÊôØÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜprofileÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÇ ‰ΩøÁî®profileÊ≥®Ëß£Êù•Â£∞ÊòéÂú®ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑÈò∂ÊÆµ‰ΩøÁî®ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑbean„ÄÇÂ∞ÜÊâÄÊúâÁöÑbeanÊï¥ÁêÜÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™profile‰∏≠ÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÂú®ÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôactiveÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑbean„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738package com.ch3;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;import org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.embedded.EmbeddedDatabaseBuilder;import org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.embedded.EmbeddedDatabaseType;import org.springframework.jndi.JndiObjectFactoryBean;import javax.sql.DataSource;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/11/24 ‰∏ãÂçà1:00 */@Configurationpublic class DataSourceConfig { @Bean(destroyMethod = "shutdown") @Profile("dev") public DataSource embeddedDataSource() { return new EmbeddedDatabaseBuilder() .setType(EmbeddedDatabaseType.H2) .addScript("classpath:test.sql") .addScript("classpath:test1.sql") .build(); } @Bean @Profile("prod") public DataSource jndiDataSource() { JndiObjectFactoryBean jndiObjectFactoryBean = new JndiObjectFactoryBean(); jndiObjectFactoryBean.setJndiName("jndi/myDS"); jndiObjectFactoryBean.setResourceRef(true); jndiObjectFactoryBean.setProxyInterface(javax.sql.DataSource.class); return (DataSource) jndiObjectFactoryBean.getObject(); }} ËôΩÁÑ∂ÊâÄÊúâÁöÑbeanÈÉΩË¢´Â£∞ÊòéÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™profileÈáåÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂè™ÊúâÂΩìÊåáÂÆöÁöÑprofileË¢´ÊøÄÊ¥ªÊó∂ÔºåÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑbeanÊâç‰ºöË¢´ÂàõÂª∫ÔºåÊ≤°ÊúâÊåáÂÆöprofileÁöÑbeanÂßãÁªàÈÉΩ‰ºöË¢´ÂàõÂª∫Ôºå‰∏éÊøÄÊ¥ªÁöÑprofileÊ≤°ÊúâÂÖ≥Á≥ª„ÄÇ Âú®XML‰∏≠ÈÖçÁΩÆprofileÔºö ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøábeansÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑprofileÂ±ûÊÄßÔºåÂú®xml‰∏≠ÈÖçÁΩÆprofile„ÄÇ 1234567891011<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:jdbc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/jdbc" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/jdbc http://www.springframework.org/schema/jdbc/spring-jdbc.xsd" profile="dev"> <jdbc:embedded-database id="dataSource"> <jdbc:script location="classpath:test.sql"/> <jdbc:script location="classpath:test1.sql"/> </jdbc:embedded-database></beans> Âè™ÊúâprofileÂ±ûÊÄß‰∏éÂΩìÂâçÊøÄÊ¥ªÁöÑprofileÁõ∏ÂåπÈÖçÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂Êâç‰ºöË¢´Áî®Âà∞„ÄÇ ÈáçÂ§ç‰ΩøÁî®beansÂ±ûÊÄßÊåáÂÆöÂ§ö‰∏™profileÔºö 1234567891011121314151617<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:jdbc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/jdbc" xmlns:jee="http://www.springframework.org/schema/jee" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans ÊøÄÊ¥ªprofileSpringÂú®Á°ÆÂÆöÂ§Ñ‰∫éÊøÄÊ¥ªÁä∂ÊÄÅÁöÑprofileÊó∂Ôºå‰æùËµñ‰∫é‰∏§‰∏™Áã¨Á´ãÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄßÔºö spring.profiles.active spring.profiles.default Âú®web.xmlÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ËÆæÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑprofileÔºö 1234567891011121314<context-param> <param-name>spring.profiles.default</param-name> <param-value>dev</param-value></context-param><servlet> <servlet-name>appServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class> <init-param> <param-name>spring.profiles.default</param-name> <param-value>dev</param-value> </init-param> <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup></servlet> ÂèØ‰ª•ÂêåÊó∂ÊøÄÊ¥ªÂ§ö‰∏™profileÔºå‰ª•ÈÄóÂè∑ÂàÜÈöî„ÄÇ ‰ΩøÁî®profileËøõË°åÊµãËØïÔºö SpringÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü@ActiveProfilesÊ≥®Ëß£ÔºåÁî®Êù•ÊåáÂÆöÊµãËØïÊó∂‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑprofile„ÄÇ 123456@RunWith(SpringJunit4ClassRunner.class)@ContextConfiguration(classes={PersistenceTestConfig.class})@ActiveProfiles("dev")public class PersistenceTest { } 3.2 Êù°‰ª∂ÂåñÁöÑbeanÈúÄÊ±ÇÔºö Â∏åÊúõ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊàñÂ§ö‰∏™beanÂè™ÊúâÂú®Á±ªË∑ØÂæÑ‰∏ãÂåÖÂê´Êüê‰∏™ÁâπÂÆöÁöÑÂ∫ìÊó∂ÊâçÂàõÂª∫ Â∏åÊúõÊüê‰∏™beanÂú®ÁâπÂÆöÁöÑbeanÂ£∞Êòé‰πãÂêéÂÜçÂàõÂª∫ Spring 4ÂºïÂÖ•‰∫Ü@ConditionalÊ≥®Ëß£ÔºåÂè™ÊúâÊù°‰ª∂ËÆ°ÁÆóÁªìÊûú‰∏∫trueÊâç‰ºöÂàõÂª∫beanÔºåÂê¶Âàô‰∏çÂàõÂª∫„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718package com.ch3;import org.springframework.core.type.AnnotatedTypeMetadata;/** * @author zhulongkun20@163.com * @since 2018/11/24 ‰∏ãÂçà2:07 */public class MagicExistsCondition implements Condition { @Override public environment.containsProperty("magic"); }} 12345@Bean@Conditional(MagicExistsCondition.class) //Êù°‰ª∂ÂåñÂàõÂª∫beanpublic MagicBean magicBean() { return new MagicBean();} ConditionContextÊé•Âè£Ôºö getClassLoaderÔºöÂä†ËΩΩÂπ∂Ê£ÄÊü•Á±ªÊòØÂê¶Â≠òÂú® AnnotatedTypeMetadataÊé•Âè£Ôºö 1234567891011public interface AnnotatedTypeMetadata { boolean isAnnotated(String var1); Map<String, Object> id‰Ωú‰∏∫ÈôêÂÆöÁ¨¶„ÄÇ 12345@Component@Qualifier("cold")public class IceCream implements Dessert { } Ê≠§Êó∂coldÈôêÂÆöÁ¨¶ÂàÜÈÖçÁªô‰∫ÜIceCream beanÔºåÂè™ÈúÄË¶ÅÂú®ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑÂú∞ÊñπÂºïÂÖ•coldÈôêÂÆöÁ¨¶Âç≥ÂèØËá™Âä®Ë£ÖÈÖç„ÄÇ 12345@Bean@Qualifier("cold")public Dessert iceCream() { return new IceCream();} scope="prototype" /> 3.5 ËøêË°åÊó∂ÂÄºÊ≥®ÂÖ•SpringÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏§ÁßçËøêË°åÊó∂Ê±ÇÂÄºÁöÑÊñπÂºèÔºö Â±ûÊÄßÂç†‰ΩçÁ¨¶ÔºàProperty placeholderÔºâÔºõ SpringË°®ËææÂºèËØ≠Ë®ÄÔºàSÁâáELÔºâ„ÄÇ containsProperty(String property)Ôºõ String[] getActiveProfiles()Ôºõ String[] getDefaultProfiles()Ôºõ boolean acceptsProfiles(String‚Ä¶ profiles)„ÄÇ Ëß£ÊûêÂ±ûÊÄßÂç†‰ΩçÁ¨¶Ôºö entry.title: LeetCode‰πãReverse Polish Notation
entry.content: 1. ÂÖ≥‰∫éReverse Polish NotationÊëòËá™ Áª¥Âü∫ÁôæÁßë ÁöÑËß£ÈáäÔºö ÈÄÜÊ≥¢ÂÖ∞Ë°®Á§∫Ê≥ïÔºàReverse Polish notationÔºåRPNÔºåÊàñÈÄÜÊ≥¢ÂÖ∞ËÆ∞Ê≥ïÔºâÔºåÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÊòØÁî±Ê≥¢ÂÖ∞Êï∞Â≠¶ÂÆ∂Êâ¨¬∑Ê≠¶Âç°Ë∞¢Áª¥Â•á1920Âπ¥ÂºïÂÖ•ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠¶Ë°®ËææÂºèÊñπÂºèÔºåÂú®ÈÄÜÊ≥¢ÂÖ∞ËÆ∞Ê≥ï‰∏≠ÔºåÊâÄÊúâÊìç‰ΩúÁ¨¶ÁΩÆ‰∫éÊìç‰ΩúÊï∞ÁöÑÂêéÈù¢ÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§‰πüË¢´Áß∞‰∏∫ÂêéÁºÄË°®Á§∫Ê≥ï„ÄÇÈÄÜÊ≥¢ÂÖ∞ËÆ∞Ê≥ï‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÊã¨Âè∑Êù•Ê†áËØÜÊìç‰ΩúÁ¨¶ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß„ÄÇ 2. È¢òÁõÆÂÜÖÂÆπEvaluate the value of an arithmetic expression in Reverse Polish Notation. Valid operators are+,-,*,/. Each operand may be an integer or another expression.Some examples: [‚Äú2‚Äù, ‚Äú1‚Äù, ‚Äú+‚Äù, ‚Äú3‚Äù, ‚Äú*‚Äù] -> ((2 + 1) * 3) -> 9 [‚Äú4‚Äù, ‚Äú13‚Äù, ‚Äú5‚Äù, ‚Äú/‚Äú, ‚Äú+‚Äù] -> (4 + (13 / 5)) -> 6 3. Ëß£È¢òÊÄùË∑ØÂØπ‰∫é‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂêàÊ≥ïÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶Êï∞ÁªÑÔºå‰æùÊ¨°Êâ´ÊèèËØ•Â≠óÁ¨¶Êï∞ÁªÑÔºö Â¶ÇÊûúËØ•Â≠óÁ¨¶ÊòØ‚Äù+‚Äù,‚Äù-‚Äú,‚Äù*‚Äù,‚Äù/‚Äú‰∏≠ÁöÑ‰ªªÊÑè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÔºåÂàôÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂ÊîæÂÖ•Ê†à‰∏≠Ôºõ Â¶ÇÊûúËØ•Â≠óÁ¨¶ÊòØÊìç‰ΩúÁ¨¶ÔºåÂàô‰ªéÊ†à‰∏≠ÂèñÂá∫‰∏§‰∏™Êìç‰ΩúÊï∞ÊåâÁÖßÈ°∫Â∫èËøõË°åËøêÁÆóÔºõ Áõ¥Âà∞Êâ´ÊèèÂÆåÊØïÔºåÂèñÂá∫Ê†à‰∏≠ÁöÑÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï∞ÔºåÂç≥‰∏∫ÁªìÊûú„ÄÇ 4. ‰ª£Á†ÅÂÆûÁé∞123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536public int evalRPN(String[] tokens) { List<String> operators = new ArrayList<String>() {{ add("+"); add("-"); add("*"); add("/"); }}; Stack<Integer> tempValue = new Stack<>(); int number1; int number2; int result = 0; for (String token : tokens) { if (!operators.contains(token)) { tempValue.push((Integer.valueOf(token))); } else { number1 = tempValue.pop(); number2 = tempValue.pop(); switch (token) { case "+": result = number2 + number1; break; case "-": result = number2 - number1; break; case "*": result = number2 * number1; break; case "/": result = number2 / number1; break; } tempValue.push(result); } } return tempValue.pop();}

entry.content: ÊúÄÂàùÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ïÊúÄËøëÂú®ÁùøÁ´ô‰∏äÁúãÂà∞BÂ∞èÂ∞ÜÁöÑÂæàÂ§öÁùøÊô∫ËØÑËÆ∫Ôºå‰∫éÊòØÊÉ≥Ëµ∑ËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÁà¨‰∏Ä‰∏ãBÁ´ôÁöÑÁî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÁúãÁúãËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÁªüËÆ°‰∏Ä‰∏ãBÁ´ôÁöÑÂπ¥ÈæÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÂæàÈÅóÊÜæÔºåÂú®‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µÈáåÂè™ËÉΩÁúãÂà∞Ê≥®ÂÜåÊó•ÊúüÂíåÁîüÊó•ÔºåËÄå‰∏çËÉΩÁúãÂà∞ÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑÁîüÊó•‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ ËøòÊòØÊç¢‰∏™ÁõÆÊ†áÂêßÔºåÂ•Ω‰πÖÊ≤°Áî®python‰∫ÜÔºåÂ∞±ÂΩìÊòØÂ§ç‰π†‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂü∫Á°ÄÁü•ËØÜ„ÄÇ‰∫éÊòØÊâæ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏ãBÁ´ôÁöÑAPIÔºåÂÆòÊñπÊ≤°ÊúâÂºÄÊîæÁöÑAPIÂèØ‰æõË∞ÉÁî®ÔºåÊÑèÊñô‰πã‰∏≠ÔºåÂ∑≤ÁªèÊúâÂ§ß‰Ω¨ÂáÜÂ§áÂ•Ω‰∫ÜÔºöGitHub-BÁ´ôÈáéÁîüÊé•Âè£ „ÄÇ 1234567891011class BilibiliSpider(object): def __init__(self): self.online_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/online" # Âú®Á∫ø‰∫∫Êï∞ self.video_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/archive/stat?&aid=%s" # ËßÜÈ¢ë‰ø°ÊÅØ self.newlist_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/newlist?&rid=%s&pn=%s&ps=%s" # ÊúÄÊñ∞ËßÜÈ¢ë‰ø°ÊÅØ self.region_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/dynamic/region?&rid=%s&pn=%s&ps=%s" # ÊúÄÊñ∞Âä®ÊÄÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ self.member_api = "http://space.bilibili.com/ajax/member/GetInfo" # Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ self.stat_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/relation/stat?vmid=%s" # Áî®Êà∑ÂÖ≥Ê≥®Êï∞ÂíåÁ≤â‰∏ùÊÄªÊï∞ self.upstat_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/space/upstat?mid=%s" # Áî®Êà∑ÊÄªÊí≠ÊîæÈáèÂíåÊÄªÈòÖËØªÈáè self.follower_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/relation/followings?vmid=%s&pn=%s&ps=%s" # Áî®Êà∑ÂÖ≥Ê≥®‰ø°ÊÅØ self.fans_api = "https://api.bilibili.com/x/relation/followers?vmid=%s&pn=%s&ps=%s" # Áî®Êà∑Á≤â‰∏ù‰ø°ÊÅØ ÊäìÂèñÂú®Á∫ø‰∫∫Êï∞ÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠êÔºåÂú® StuPeter ÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠êÈáåÊúâÁé∞ÊàêÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÔºö 1234567def member_online_count(self): ret_val = requests.get(self.online_api) if ret_val.status_code != 200 or ret_val.content is None: print("Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçÂú®Á∫ø‰∫∫Êï∞Â§±Ë¥•") return None ret_content = json.loads(ret_val.content) return ret_content["data"]["web_online"] Â∞ÜËøîÂõûÊï∞ÊçÆÂÜôÂÖ•Êñá‰ª∂ÊØèÊ¨°ÊâßË°åËÑöÊú¨ÈÉΩËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏ãÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥Ôºö 12345def write_to_file(self, cnt): now = datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") f = open(self.file, "a") content_to_write = "[" + now + "] : [" + str(cnt) + "]" f.write(content_to_write + "\n") ÈÖçÁΩÆÂÆöÊó∂‰ªªÂä°ÈÖçÁΩÆÂÆöÊó∂‰ªªÂä°(Ubantu18.04)ÊØèÂçÅÂàÜÈíüÊâßË°å‰∏ÄÊ¨°Ôºö 10,10,20,30,40,50 * * * * python /home/username/python/bilibili_spider.py matplotlibÊäòÁ∫øÂõæÂ±ïÁ§∫Áà¨ÂÆåÊï∞ÊçÆ‰πãÂêéÊï∞ÊçÆÊï∞ÊçÆÈÉΩÂú®Êñá‰ª∂ÈáåÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Êï∞ÊçÆÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ËØªÂèñËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑ Êó∂Èó¥ Âíå ‰∫∫Êï∞ÂÄºÔºåÂÅöÊàêÊäòÁ∫øÂõæÔºö ËøòÈúÄË¶ÅÂÜçÁ†îÁ©∂Á†îÁ©∂Ôºåto be updated‚Ä¶

‰ΩøÁî®githubÂ§á‰ªΩËΩªÊùæÂ§á‰ªΩgithubÊú¨Êù•Â∞±ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ªìÂ∫ìÔºåÁî®ÂÆÉÊù•Â§á‰ªΩÊúÄÂêàÈÄÇ‰∏çËøá‰∫Ü„ÄÇ Âª∫Á´ãÊú¨Âú∞Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÔºåÂ∞ÜÈúÄË¶ÅÂ§á‰ªΩÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Â≠òÊã∑Ë¥ùÂà∞ËØ•Êñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏≠Ôºõ Âú®username.github.io‰ªìÂ∫ì‰∏ãÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÔºõ Âª∫Á´ãÊú¨Âú∞Â§á‰ªΩÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏éËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÁöÑÂÖ≥ËÅîÔºõ Â∞ÜÊú¨Âú∞Êñá‰ª∂Â§πpushÂà∞‰ªìÂ∫ìÔºõ
